email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Cargo Shipment to Broker Inc.
email_chain.body:
Hi Rob,

Just wanted to check in regarding our last communication. I understand there have been some issues getting that cargo through Greek Customs.

Could you please explain the situation to me and give me your plans to deliver the product to Broker Inc.?

Thank you!

Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Cargo Shipment to Broker Inc.
email_chain.body:
Hi Rob,

Since our last communication, the shipping container was unloaded in Thessaloniki, Greece. Since then, it has been at the port for the last three weeks trying to be cleared through Customs. I have been in touch with my local representative on a daily basis to see if the product can be cleared. For now, there is no update. I am worried that our clients are going to be concerned about the delay.

Could you please provide me with an estimated timeline so we can let my client know if and when the product can be released?

Thank you!

Max

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Cargo Shipment to Broker Inc.
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,

Unfortunately, I was not aware of the situation with the Customs. I will get in touch with the local representative to find out what is going on. I will keep you updated as soon as I have more information.

Best regards,

Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Cargo Shipment to Broker Inc. - Update on Greek Customs
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,

Thanks for the update. I've been in touch with the local representative in Greece. The container has been unloading for two weeks now. There is a lot of back and forth between the shipper, the shipper's agent in Greece, and the local Customs agent. In the mean time, the shipper had to pay several fines to the Greek Customs.

Currently, the container is at the port in Thessaloniki, waiting for the shipper to send a new bill of lading for it. Once the bill of lading is sent, the container will be cleared and sent to Broker Inc.

I've attached a couple of photos to give you an idea of the situation. As soon as the bill of lading is approved, I'll let you know and send you more photos of the process.

Best regards,

Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Cargo Shipment to Broker Inc. - Customs Update + Photo
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,

I've attached a photo of the container clearing through Greek Customs. Once I receive the bill of lading, I will send you the next pictures of the container as it is being loaded onto a transport truck. We hope to have the container at the shipper's warehouse within two weeks.

Best regards,

Rob

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Cargo Shipment to Broker Inc. - Update from Shipper's Warehouse
email_chain.body:
Hi Max,

The container is finally at the shipper's warehouse in California. Unfortunately, there are still problems with it getting to the shipping agent in San Francisco. The forwarding agent tried to take it there but was told by the freight broker that it had already been invoiced to them. The forwarding agent was told to contact the broker directly and tell him there is a problem.

After further research, it turns out that the broker had previously issued another bill of lading to the shipper. They sent an agent.

Best regards,

Rob

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Shipping Schedule and Tank Size - Quote Discrepancy

email_chain.body:
Dear Leanne,

Thank you for your email. I see your previous quote #201232-171028 was under the wrong name, so I will update the details now. Please see the corrected details:

Tank size: 50K
45 tonne/hectolitre - HPMC precast pile driving concrete
No. of tanks: 1
Destination: Australia/ VIC/ Stony Creek 
Address: 159 Stony Creek Rd, Stony Creek VIC 3971

Please note that you want the following to be processed as a new job:

Tank size: 40K
45 tonne/hectolitre - HPMC precast pile driving concrete
No. of tanks: 1
Destination: Australia/ VIC/ Stony Creek 
Address: 159 Stony Creek Rd, Stony Creek VIC 3971

Kind regards,
Anita

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Shipping Schedule and Tank Size - Quote Discrepancy
email_chain.body:
Dear Anita,

Thank you for confirming the previous details, but I am having trouble locating the costings for the 40K delivery. If those figures are OK and you can forward the costings on, I will proceed with these orders. For reference, please find attached our confidentiality agreement.

Regards,
Leanne

CONFIDENTIALITY AGREEMENT

In consideration of each Party entering into the following transaction and providing to the other Party specified documentation, the Parties agree as follows:

1. Confidentiality:
(a) Definitions:
“Confidential Information” means all information, whether oral or written, disclosed by any Party to the other Party, including, but not limited to, technical, financial, and commercial information regarding Products, Technology, Personnel, the Companies and the business of each of them, marketing plans and business strategies of any Party, and any other proprietary information disclosed by one Party to the other Party,

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry - Concrete Blocks from Denmark to Zurich
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

My name is Ian McKellan from Blue Oar Maritime Limited. My phone number is +41 100 000 000.

I'm writing on behalf of a colleague, Mr. Rudolf Acers, who is based in Frankfurt. He needs assistance arranging the shipment of an unusual cargo: 30 x 2-inch square concrete blocks from Denmark to Zurich.

Could you please confirm whether you can handle this cargo and what your minimum booking quantities might be?

Thank you for your time.

Kind regards,
Ian McKellan
Blue Oar Maritime Limited

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry - Concrete Blocks from Denmark to Zurich
email_chain.body:
Dear Ian,

Thank you for your email regarding the shipment of concrete blocks.

We confirm that Blue Oar Maritime Ltd. can handle this cargo. The minimum quantity we can handle is one block.

Please advise when Mr. Acers intends to proceed with the booking and the estimated delivery dates to Zurich.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Blue Oar Maritime Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry - Concrete Blocks from Denmark to Zurich
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your prompt response to Mr. McKellan's query.

I would be grateful if you could clarify the following:

1. Are the blocks packed individually in their own crates, or are they packed together in a single crate?
2. How many crates per shipment can you handle?

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Rudolf Acers

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry - Concrete Blocks from Denmark to Zurich
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Acers,

In response to your questions:

1. The blocks will be packed in individual crates.
2. There will be one block per crate, so a total of 30 crates for the entire shipment.
3. Blue Oar Maritime Ltd. can handle all 30 crates per shipment.

Please let me know if you require further clarification.

Best Regards,
Blue Oar Maritime Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry - Concrete Blocks from Denmark to Zurich - Quotation
email_chain.body:

Following our previous correspondence, I understand you require a quotation for the shipment of 30 x 2-inch square concrete blocks from Denmark to Zurich.

We at Blue Oar Maritime Ltd. are pleased to provide the following quotation:

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Ammonium Nitrate Shipment to Iran

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Ammonium Nitrate Shipment to Iran
email_chain.body:

Thank you for your inquiry. Due to current circumstances, all our deliveries to Iran are routed through Ukrainian transit.

We can offer container No. XHG 359 for your shipment. It can depart from Shenzhen around the beginning of June, although you can begin loading as early as May 14th. Estimated delivery to Iran is June 29th.

Please let me know if you require any further assistance.

Kind regards,
Janine Weber

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Ammonium Nitrate Shipment to Iran
email_chain.body:

Many thanks for the speedy response! We will proceed with booking container XHG 359 and plan to begin loading on May 14th as scheduled.

Regards,
Luca

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: 60,000 MT Hand Rolled Paper - New Orleans to Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Atilano,

We are planning a shipment of 60,000 MT of hand-rolled paper from New Orleans to Vancouver in October. We are looking for a carrier with flexible laycan dates to mitigate potential demurrage costs. Could you please advise on your typical laycan flexibility, or if you usually require a fixed timeframe (e.g., 8 weeks) between shipment and arrival?

Best regards,
Jesse Rich

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 60,000 MT Hand Rolled Paper - New Orleans to Vancouver
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rich,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can be flexible with laycan dates on both ends to minimize demurrage concerns. We are happy to work with you to arrange suitable dates for both the loading and discharge ports. Please let us know your preferred dates, and we can check vessel availability.

Thank you,
Christina Atilano

email_chain.body:
Dear Christina,

Our consignee would like to know the break bulk tariff for hand-rolled paper. Could you please send this directly to my email?

Best Regards,
Jesse Rich

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Discharge Assistance Needed - Dubai to Antwerp Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning, Mr. Moser,

Our vessel en route from Dubai to Antwerp is facing a limited discharging window and a likely arrival delay. Our client urgently requires 7,000 MT of flour by tomorrow. We would greatly appreciate your assistance in arranging expedited discharge for this charter, potentially diverting to the nearest suitable port if necessary.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to your response.

Regards,
Lydia

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Discharge Assistance Needed - Dubai to Antwerp Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dearest Lydia,

I'm currently facing a challenging situation due to recent vessel cancellations impacting my schedule. My vessel is expected to sail to the Port of Kiel within the next few days and will remain on standby at the scheduled ports. I will let you know once we arrive at Antwerp. 

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Manuel

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Discharge Assistance Needed - Dubai to Antwerp Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Manuel,

We urgently need to deliver flour to Antwerp and require a vessel ASAP. Is there any possibility to fit our cargo into your schedule?

Regards,
Lydia

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent: Discharge Assistance Needed - Dubai to Antwerp Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Lydia,

I apologize for the delay in my response. Unfortunately, I am currently unable to accommodate a charter to the Port of Antwerp at this time due to scheduling constraints. I would recommend that you contact an alternative shipper to meet your urgent requirement.

Kind regards,
Manuel

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Potential Career Opportunities
email_chain.body:
Dear Hiring Team,

I am writing to express my strong interest in potential career opportunities at your company. While I am new to the industry, I am highly motivated and eager to learn.

I am currently pursuing my Master's degree in International Relations at the London School of Economics. I am exploring options that would allow me to leverage my analytical and research skills in a new and challenging environment.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
Alicia Newman

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Job Advertisement - [mention specific job if known]
email_chain.body:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I hope this email finds you well.

I recently came across your job advertisement for [mention specific job if known] and was wondering if my background might be a good fit. I am a second-year Master's student at Stanford University with several years of experience at a development-focused non-profit.

Would you be able to advise on whether this position, or others at your company, might align with my experience and qualifications? I am very interested in learning more about opportunities at your organization.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Isaac Choi

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Job Posting and Potential Part-Time Consulting
email_chain.body:
Dear Hiring Team,

I am writing to express my interest in a job posting I saw on your website. I am currently completing my Master's degree in Public Policy from MIT and am interning at an impact-focused non-profit.

I am interested in applying for this position and I was also wondering if there might be a possibility of a part-time consulting arrangement.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you.

Best Regards,
Dev Patel

email_chain.subject: Internship Opportunity Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Khan,

I noticed your advertisement on LinkedIn for internship opportunities at your company.

I am a senior in high school and would be very interested in the possibility of working with your team. I have experience in writing, data analysis, and strategy development. I am a proactive and driven individual, always seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

If there are any internship possibilities available, I would be grateful for the opportunity to discuss how my skills and enthusiasm could contribute to your organization.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
John Smith

email_chain.body:

We are requesting a DAP rate from Busan to Rio de Janeiro for a shipment of naphthalene. We are open to any suitable vessel type. Could you also provide details regarding your cargo insurance coverage?

Thanks,

Jenna Rowe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Naphthalene - Busan to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Rowe,

Thank you for your email.

We can offer a DAP rate of USD 13,250 from Busan to Rio de Janeiro for naphthalene, utilizing an E-Type vessel. Our cargo insurance coverage provides a maximum of USD 500 per thousand tons or 10% of the insured value, whichever is greater.

Would you like to proceed with this booking? If so, please provide your cargo loading information as soon as possible.

Thank you and have a nice day.

Regards,

Hyeon-Jong Cho, Manager

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Naphthalene - Busan to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body:
Hello, Hyeon-Jong,

Thank you for the quick response.

Before we move forward, could you please provide your full Terms and Conditions? This will help us in our internal risk assessment.

For your information, our terms of delivery are EXW.

Thanks,
Jenna Rowe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Naphthalene - Busan to Rio de Janeiro
email_chain.body:
Hello, Jenna,

Thank you for your email.

Please find our updated Terms and Conditions attached (updated as of October 2nd). Please note that RAK Shipping is the designated carrier for shipments from Busan to Rio de Janeiro.

Sincerely yours,

Hyeon-Jong Cho, Manager

email_chain.subject: Catching Up
email_chain.body:
Hey Heather,

Hope you're doing well. The company has been going strong all summer, and things seem to be picking up even more lately. 

How are the kids doing?  Let me know when you have a free moment to chat - we should get together soon.

We're thinking about heading to Disney World next weekend.  Just kicking around the idea right now.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Catching Up
email_chain.body:
Hey Heather,

Just saw some weather reports mentioning potential storms in the Orlando area next weekend. Might be something to keep an eye on if you're thinking of visiting Disney World too.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Asphalt Shipment - Rotterdam to Newark
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bowles,

We have a special order of 1,600 tons of asphalt to ship from Rotterdam to Newark. We need delivery by the end of this month and are hoping for a reasonable rate. Can you please get back to us within 2 hours?

Hope to hear from you soon.

Alisa

email_chain.subject: RE: Asphalt Shipment - Rotterdam to Newark
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon, Alisa.

I apologize, but we received updated pricing information. The final price of asphalt has gone up, requiring an adjustment to our rate. We're now looking at $9,600 instead of the initial estimate of $7,000. Please advise as soon as you can.

Thanks for your time and attention.

Please find attached the contract.

Joe

<Contract.pdf>

email_chain.subject: RE: Asphalt Shipment - Rotterdam to Newark
email_chain.body:
Joe,

I'm afraid the price increase seems to be based on incorrect information on your end. Our internal information indicates that the original price was the correct one. Would you kindly update your contract to reflect the $7,000 amount?

Please let me know if there are any other changes we need to make.

Thank you for your prompt attention.

Alisa

email_chain.subject: RE: Asphalt Shipment - Rotterdam to Newark
email_chain.body: Fine. Our underwriter in Amsterdam got back to us after your phone call. They are reluctant to insure your shipment.

email_chain.subject: RE: Asphalt Shipment - Rotterdam to Newark
email_chain.body:
For the record, your proposal is back in my inbox, and I am ready to accept your quote within 24 hours. Yes, $7,000 is fine.

Please advise when you are ready.

I am happy to provide any additional information you need.

Joe

email_chain.subject: Regarding Your Recent Dry Cleaning Solvent Purchase
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Howard,

Thank you for your recent purchase of dry cleaning solvents on Friday. We are writing to inform you of a potential delay in processing your payment.

We've recently encountered some internal issues that are affecting payment processing. This is uncommon for us, and we are currently investigating the cause. 

If you would prefer to expedite the payment, could you please confirm that the credit/debit card on file is correct?

Thanks in advance for your understanding.

Sincerely,
Tyler

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Your Recent Dry Cleaning Solvent Purchase
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Howard,

Just a quick update: we believe we've identified the issue affecting payment processing and are actively investigating it further. We'll reach back out to you as soon as we have more information.

Thanks for your patience.

Sincerely,
Tyler

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Your Recent Dry Cleaning Solvent Purchase - Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Howard,

We'd like to share an update from our investigation. 

We've identified a situation where a payment file was not transmitted to our bank on schedule. This prevented us from processing your payment. 

The payment has been rescheduled, and the funds will be withdrawn within the next 1-2 business days. We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience.

Thanks,
Tyler

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Your Recent Dry Cleaning Solvent Purchase - Further Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Howard,

Please accept our apologies for the delay in responding to your email. We're still working through some internal issues, but we are nearing a resolution.

Thank you again for your continued patience.

Sincerely,
Tyler

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Office Hours
email_chain.body:

Office Hours:

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Office Hours
email_chain.body:

Regards,

email_chain.subject: Shipment Inquiry: Adhesives and Yeast
email_chain.body:
Dear Shaikh,

We have received a 5,600 MT shipment of adhesives from Antwerp to Narva and a 3,600 MT shipment of yeast from Fos-sur-Mer to Antwerp. Could you please confirm your earliest loading date for both shipments and if you offer any dispatch for early completion?

Looking forward to your reply.

Kind regards,
Aleksander Marczyk

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipment Inquiry: Adhesives and Yeast
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Marczyk,

Thank you for your inquiry and for considering International Forwarding & Shipping GmbH. 

I understand both shipments were offloaded on February 3rd from the vessel BARGE BRIGADE. As we operate under port-to-port (RORL) terms, we would need to know your intended loading date to provide a tailored shipping quotation.

We don't have a standard dispatch rate; it's calculated on a case-by-case basis.

Please contact us with your earliest loading date for a precise shipping quote.

Thank you for your attention.

Yours faithfully,

International Forwarding & Shipping GmbH
Tel. +49 221 84 07-40
http://www.ifc-jade.de/en/index.php?id=63

email_chain.subject: Invoice for Services Rendered
email_chain.body:
Dearest Shaikh,

I am sending you an invoice for $4,500 for services rendered in 2011. I will also forward an updated letter of credit for the payment.

Our company finances are currently tight, so I have requested a further discount. I expect the updated letter of credit to arrive via courier next week.

Thank you,
Sincerely,
Aleksander

email_chain.subject: Re: Invoice for Services Rendered
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Marczyk,

I am in receipt of your correspondence of the 21st and the 30th of April, and I kindly refer to our email exchanges of the 15th, 19th and 21st of February regarding the payment.

As I understood from your discount request, you asked us to discount the amount agreed upon on February 14th by 5% and pay the balance of $7,600.00 in Swiss francs to our bank account on that date. Please note that we received a payment of $3,200.00 (converted from Swiss francs) in our account on March 14th, 2011, so we could not apply the 5% discount to the sum, as the total amount in Swiss francs received was less than expected.

email_chain.subject: Complaint regarding recent product update
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon,

I'm writing to express my strong dissatisfaction with a recent product update. While I appreciate innovation, I find the direction confusing and not aligned with my needs. For example, the way you're encouraging users to engage with the platform feels forced and out of touch. 

I'm also frustrated with the increasing reliance on outdated trends. Frankly, I'm tired of seeing these design choices. Please focus on improving functionality and user experience instead of chasing fleeting fads.

I've been a loyal customer for a long time, and all I want is a platform that meets my needs. This update has been deeply disappointing. I'm hoping for a chance to reconsider my experience after future fixes.

Sincerely,
Concerned Customer

email_chain.subject: Re: Complaint regarding recent product update
email_chain.body:
Dear Concerned Customer,

Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns regarding the recent product update. 

We understand your frustration and want to assure you that we take all feedback seriously. Our goal is to provide a positive experience for all our users, and we apologize that the update has not met your expectations.

Please know that our team is actively working to address the issues raised by users like you. We value your loyalty and hope you will continue to use our product. We are truly sorry if this has soured your perception of us.

Thank you again for your feedback. We will keep you updated on our progress.

Sincerely,
The ProductCompany Support Team

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Complaint regarding recent product update - Deletion request
email_chain.body:
Thank you for your email. I was checking my spam folder because I hadn't received a response until now. I've read it, but I'm still unsure why I should delete my account simply for complaining about the product or service. That's precisely what I want to do – voice my concerns about aspects that are annoying and difficult to deal with. 

I want the company to know I have a problem with their product. So, please reconsider and do not delete my account. If you still intend to remove me, at least provide a clear reason why you no longer want me as a user. 

Thank you,
Concerned Customer

email_chain.subject: Introduction - RGD FOODS: Nutritional Ingredients and Food Processing Solutions
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I would like to introduce you to our company RGD FOODS who offers nutritional ingredients and food processing solutions. We specialize in wheat germ, malt extract, soy protein, and more.

We are looking to partner with reliable suppliers to provide high-quality ingredients for our products. Our company is looking for a reliable, experienced supplier who can provide high-quality ingredients on a regular basis. We are also looking for a supplier who can provide reliable transportation services, along with a strong commitment to customer service and quality.

Best regards,

Rich

Rich

Matias Industries is one of the largest suppliers of dehydrated foods in Canada. We have been in business for over 30 years and have built a reputation for providing high-quality products and excellent customer service. Our team of experts is dedicated to finding the best suppliers and ensuring that our customers receive the highest quality products.

email_chain.subject: Re: Introduction - RGD FOODS: Nutritional Ingredients and Food Processing Solutions
email_chain.body:
Hi Rich,

Thanks for reaching out to us. We have just returned to Pakistan and will be in touch soon.

email_chain.subject: Re: Introduction - RGD FOODS: Nutritional Ingredients and Food Processing Solutions
email_chain.body:
Hey Rich,

Thanks for your quick response. Could you please provide more information about your products, such as how long they take to ship, if there are any delays we should expect, and other pertinent information. I am also interested in receiving your quote for the FOB port.

Thank you!

email_chain.subject: Re: Introduction - RGD FOODS: Nutritional Ingredients and Food Processing Solutions
email_chain.body:
Hi Jan,

We can provide you with an FOB quote for any container size and are happy to discuss other requirements. The delivery time for our products is usually 7-10 days, but we can sometimes provide shorter delivery times. We have a team of experts who can help with any additional requirements or concerns you may have.

Please feel free to contact me for more information or to place an order.

email_chain.body: Hello

email_chain.subject: Cargo Opportunity: Singapore to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Ballard,

We're looking to fill some empty slots on a 180-day journey from Singapore to Cape Town. We have approximately 80,000 MT of heavy oil and 150,000 MT of fertilizer that would be a good fit for your vessel. We're also willing to offer a COTI discount.

Thanks,
Devon

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Opportunity: Singapore to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Dear Devon,

Thank you for reaching out. While we don't have immediate availability for a full 180-day turnaround, we do have three slots opening up in approximately 60 days that might work. We would be able to offer the COTI discount you mentioned.

If you're interested, please send us your target pricing and any specific shipping instructions you have.

Thanks,

Ms. Ballard

email_chain.subject: RE: Cargo Opportunity: Singapore to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Dear Devon,

Following up on Ms. Ballard's email, it appears we have a 30-day slot available sooner than the 60-day window. However, due to existing commitments for bulk and finished oil on that journey, we won't be able to offer the COTI discount. The freight rate will be $40 per ton, and the loading port will be Houston. 

Please send your forwarding instructions by 7:00 AM tomorrow if you wish to proceed.

Regards,

Mark

email_chain.subject: Revised Offer: 60-Day Slot Availability
email_chain.body:
Good Afternoon Devon,

Please disregard my previous email regarding the 30-day slot. I apologize for the confusion. We do not have availability within the next two weeks.

However, we would be pleased to accommodate your cargo on our next available 60-day voyage. This voyage will also carry bulk and finished oil.

Our price remains at $40 per ton. We can offer loading in either Houston or Antwerp, whichever is more convenient for you. Please confirm by 7:00 AM tomorrow if you can commit to the 60-day slot.

Regards,

Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Offer: 60-Day Slot Availability
email_chain.body:
Dear Mark,

Thank you for clarifying the details of the 60-day voyage. The terms sound acceptable. We'll proceed based on your proposal.

Thanks for your help,

Devon

labels.commodity: Heavy Oil, Fertilizer, Bulk Oil, Finished Oil

email_chain.subject: Naphtha Shipment Request - Kalamazoo to Philadelphia
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

We’re interested in a load of naphtha from Kalamazoo to Philadelphia. Let us know if you can quote a rate and deliver a first shipment on 2023-05-01. We’re also interested in confirming your laycan.

Regards,
Caroline Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Naphtha Shipment Request - Kalamazoo to Philadelphia
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

Thank you for getting back to me. May we talk in more detail about our loads to Philadelphia? I’m sorry, but I’m not familiar with Kalamazoo. May we be in touch again once we have some detailed quotes from you?

Kind regards,
Caroline Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Naphtha Shipment Request - Kalamazoo to Philadelphia
email_chain.body:
Hello Caroline,

Understood. I'll prepare a detailed quote for a naphtha shipment from a more common origin point to Philadelphia, and then we can discuss further.

Kind regards,
James Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Naphtha Shipment Request - Kalamazoo to Philadelphia
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

Thank you for that quote. It's quite good. Please let me know as soon as possible. 

Thanks a lot.
Caroline Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Naphtha Shipment Request - Kalamazoo to Philadelphia
email_chain.body:
Caroline,

I will.

Kind regards,
James Miller

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Cargo from Sohar
email_chain.body:
Hello Saima,

We have a cargo of 7,200 MT of bitumen available out of Sohar. This export cargo is from our account. The loading is scheduled for May 14th, with a transit time of 10-14 days.

Can you manage this within the latest rate card?

Thanks,
Sarfaraz.

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Cargo from Sohar
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarfaraz,

Thanks for your email.

As per our agreement, we require the Letter of Credit (L/C) to be submitted by May 14th. I highly recommend submitting it as early as possible. If we receive the L/C by the 14th, we should be able to issue the Bill of Lading for this cargo.

If we do not receive the L/C by the 14th, we will be unable to issue the Bill of Lading.

Best,
Mohammed.

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Cargo Import Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Saima,

We would like to import one bitumen cargo through you, as per our MOU.

Could you please send your rate card and let me know the earliest possible loading dates?

Details:
*   Date of Loading: June 15th
*   Payment Terms: D/P 90 Days
*   Port of Loading: Sohar

Please reply to this email.

Best regards,
Mohammed.

email_chain.subject: Re: Bitumen Cargo Import Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mohammed,

We would be pleased to load your cargo, but we'd like to wait until we have more details about your project.

Your project name will be passed to our business development department, and they will check it with our clients who have the most current details. I'd also like to check the availability of space with our local charterer.

In the meantime, do you need any help with chartering a ship?

Regards,
Saima

email_chain.subject: Bitumen Inquiry - 25,000 MT from Sohar
email_chain.body:
We are interested in taking a bitumen shipment of 25,000 MT from Sohar port.

The details are as follows:
1.  Document required: Any one of D/P, D/A, D/U, Tri or Cash.
2.  Port of Loading: Sohar
3.  Port of Discharge: Mumbai
4.  Date of Loading: ASAP, to dispatch to Mumbai port before the last week of April
5.  Ship’s arrival: Within 8-10 days
6.  Disbursement: Cash or D/P
7.  Incoterms: EXW

Please reply with a quote for your offer and let us know the earliest possible date for the cargo to arrive.

email_chain.body: Hey i’m sam

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Expatriate Recommendation for France
email_chain.body:
I’m Sam writing to see if you are still working on this. I couldn't find a recent email address to contact you.

It's about the case for the France project you were recently asked questions about. The first stage was to check our profile and their background.

This second stage is asking if I can be helpful. I am happy to assist. Here is what they requested from me:

1.  Could you help us with a recommendation of an expatriate? Where would he live? If he lives in Muscat, is it with a small or big family?
2.  If he has a wife, can we get some information about her? A recommendation? If she can speak English, that would be helpful.

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry: 400T Unmanufactured Titanium - Suzhou to Ningbo
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Johnson,

We're arranging transport for 400T of unmanufactured titanium from Suzhou to Ningbo. Could you please provide a bid, and confirm if you have on-board transport coverage under DAP (Delivered at Place) terms?

Thanks,
Vanessa Chen

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 400T Unmanufactured Titanium - Suzhou to Ningbo
email_chain.body:
Hi Vanessa,

Thank you for your email. Our initial estimate for the transportation is 27,850 USD. A formal confirmation letter will be sent via email shortly.

Please feel free to contact us at any time if you have any other requirements.

Thank you again,
Robert Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 400T Unmanufactured Titanium - Suzhou to Ningbo
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

I've checked with our clients, and they'd prefer to utilize our bonded warehouse in Ningbo. We'll be arranging for 200T to be delivered to the warehouse there. Please revise the quote accordingly.

Thanks,
Vanessa Chen

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 400T Unmanufactured Titanium - Suzhou to Ningbo
email_chain.body:
Hi Vanessa,

I've found container pricing with 28% DDP (Delivered Duty Paid) for the full 400T. The price is 1190 USD/ton, totaling 476,000 USD (400T x 1190 USD/ton = 476,000 USD).

Please review this, and I will send a detailed DDP cost breakdown shortly.

Best regards,
Robert Johnson

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Copper Scrap Purchase from Tangier
email_chain.body:
Hello Françoise,

Thank you for shipping the bulk chemicals from Antwerp to Tangier last week. We are now looking to purchase copper scrap from Tangier port for April delivery. We require 5,000 MT. Could you please provide information on the cargo and port charges?

Very best,
Louise Olsen

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Copper Scrap Purchase from Tangier
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Olsen,

Thank you for your inquiry. According to our database, the cargo and port charges are USD 190,000.00 per 1,000 MT for copper scrap in Tangier.
We can arrange shipment in April as requested.

Please let us know your FOB price if you would like to order more than 5,000 MT of copper scrap.

Best regards,
Anna Kovacs

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Copper Scrap Purchase from Tangier
email_chain.body:
Hello Anna,

Thank you for your quick response. Regarding the 5,000 MT of copper scrap, is this quantity currently available? Also, can you confirm the copper scrap origin? Please advise on the availability.

Kind regards,
Louise Olsen

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Copper Scrap Purchase from Tangier
email_chain.body:
Dear Anna Kovacs,

Thank you for your inquiry. We currently have 2,000MT of copper scrap available for sale. The port and cargo charges are USD 190,000.00 per 1,000MT. If you are interested, please let me know your FOB price. 

Kind regards,
Louise Olsen

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Copper Scrap Purchase from Tangier
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Olsen,

Thank you for your inquiry. We currently have 2,000 MT of copper scrap available for sale at this time. The port and cargo charges are USD 190,000.00 per 1,000 MT. If you are still interested, please let me know your FOB price.

Kind regards,
Anna Kovacs

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: 1,800 MT Olefins - Shanghai to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Neal,

We require a tanker for 1,800 MT of olefins from Shanghai to Singapore. Could you please confirm your earliest berth availability in Singapore? Also, do you typically quote under C&F terms?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 1,800 MT Olefins - Shanghai to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Hi Neal,

Following up on my previous email regarding the 1,800 MT olefins delivery. I noticed the listing on your website and wanted to reiterate my inquiry. Could you please confirm your earliest berth availability for Singapore? And do you typically quote under C&F terms?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 1,800 MT Olefins - Shanghai to Singapore
email_chain.body:
Alex,

My apologies, it seems my previous response was mistakenly deleted by the system. 

Regarding the 1,800 MT olefins delivery to Singapore, our earliest berth availability is currently June 11-12. Therefore, your vessel would need to arrive in Singapore no later than June 7th to ensure berthing within that window. Again, I apologize for the inconvenience.

Regards,
Ana

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: 2,000 MT Delivery - China to Singapore - June 10th
email_chain.body:
Hello Neal,

I recently accepted a 2,000 MT delivery from China to Singapore. Do you have any berth availability in Singapore around June 10th? I would like to get a quote for that date if possible.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: 15,000MT Diesel - London to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

Please confirm your rate for transporting 15,000MT of diesel from London to Hamburg. Will your vessel be available for loading next week? Could you also confirm your suggested laycan dates? Finally, what is your average daily demurrage rate, and is there any possibility of reducing this rate if loading is expedited?

Thank you,
Saul

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 15,000MT Diesel - London to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Saul,

Thank you for your inquiry. 

Please find below the details for transporting 15,000MT of diesel from London to Hamburg:

*   Price: $1.22/bbl FOB
*   Vessel: Yes, our vessel *Agape* is available for loading next week.
*   ETA Hamburg: Approximately October 25th.
*   Laycan: October 15th onwards.
*   Daily Demurrage Rate: $2,000. This rate could be lowered subject to expedited loading.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this transaction.

Regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 15,000MT Diesel - London to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Fred,

Thank you for confirming the price. We will certainly do our best to expedite the loading process. 

Regarding the demurrage rate...

email_chain.subject: Cargo Inquiry: 28,000 MT Singapore to China
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Bae,

I have an inquiry for the shipment of 28,000 MT of cargo from Singapore to China. I'm looking for a freight quote under FOB terms. We're flexible on the exact schedule, but can you provide a cost estimate based on an approximately 10-day voyage? Please let me know what port options are available for loading in Singapore.

Best regards,
Ken Stewart

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry: 28,000 MT Singapore to China
email_chain.body:
Dear Ken,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can certainly offer a very competitive rate for a vessel to transport your 28,000 MT cargo from Singapore to China. Our voyage schedule is flexible, so date constraints shouldn't be an issue.

To provide a more accurate quote, please specify your preferred loading port in Singapore. If the cargo is located in South Singapore, we can potentially prepare a vessel for same-day departure.

Best regards,
Mr. Bae

email_chain.subject: Cargo Inquiry: 2,400 MT Singapore to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Mr. Bae,

Our customer is now requesting a quote for the transportation of 2,400 MT of cargo from Singapore to Amsterdam. They would like the vessel to depart Singapore in approximately two weeks and arrive in Amsterdam within a month.

Please provide an estimated cost for this shipment.

Ken

email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment Advice: New York to Sydney
email_chain.body:
Dear friends,

I have an urgent request for a 7,700 MT coal shipment from New York to Sydney. My vessel is a 1998-built LNG carrier, and I'm trying to determine the best option for procuring the coal. I'm considering offers from Santos and Gogoro. Which do you think would be a better market to pursue in this situation?

Hugs,
Roberto

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment Advice: New York to Sydney - Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Thank you for your email. 

We can potentially handle sourcing the coal from Santos. My vessel is a 2002-built tanker and can take approximately 7,000 MT of cargo. I've just received preliminary approval to commence loading at Santos. Considering Santos' proximity to my current location, I'm leaning towards that option.

Thank you again for your advice.
Francisco

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment Advice: New York to Sydney - Gogoro
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Thank you for your email.

I also received a request for around 7,000 MT of coal, potentially from Santos, and I consulted Francisco about it (as you know, he's involved with Santos). The distance from Santos to my ship is significant, so personally I prefer not to go to Santos at this time.

Thank you.
Pedro

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment Advice: New York to Sydney
email_chain.body: Thanks all, much appreciated.

email_chain.subject: Urgent Request: Charter of Ro/Ro Vessels
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,

We have a last-minute project requiring the charter of two 6,000 MT Ro/Ro carriers, with availability needed in two weeks. Any chance you can assist?

Kind regards,
Deirdre Byrne

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent Request: Charter of Ro/Ro Vessels
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,

I just received your message. I have two vessels available that might work for you. Both are currently in Los Angeles and are still loaded from their previous voyage, but unloading and preparing them for your cargo shouldn't take too long.

To assess feasibility, could you please provide more details on your cargo, the loading/discharge ports, and the required laytime? Also, please provide your target freight rate and any potential costs related to delays.

Regards,
John Anderson

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent Request: Charter of Ro/Ro Vessels - Follow Up
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,

My co-chairman is back from China, and I have more details regarding the Ro/Ro charter. This is a strategically important deal for us, and I'd prefer to work with you directly on it. 

John is out of the office for the next two days. Would you be available to meet sometime this week to discuss the project in detail? Please let me know a time and place that works for you.

Regards,
Deirdre Byrne

email_chain.subject: Steel Shipment - Rotterdam to Dalian - Laycan Request
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We have a shipment of steel heading from Rotterdam to Dalian. Please provide your earliest laycan for loading.

Let us know if you have any questions!

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipment - Rotterdam to Dalian - Laycan Request
email_chain.body:
John,

Sorry for the delayed response. I missed your message last week. I am currently on the west coast and don't have all the vessel details readily available.

Would you mind calling me at +1-555-123-4567? I can answer all your questions regarding the vessel's crew and specifications.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipment - Rotterdam to Dalian - Laycan Request
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your call yesterday. I have forwarded the vessel information to our east coast contact who is handling negotiations with the mills.

We are currently waiting for an offer on your steel from an east coast mill. 

I will let you know when we have a final decision.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipment - Rotterdam to Dalian - Laycan Request
email_chain.body:
John,

I am sorry to hear about your brother's condition. I hope he gets well soon.

Please let me know if you have any questions regarding the steel shipment.

Best regards,
Tuna

email_chain.subject: Vessel Inquiry: New Orleans to Kuwait - Copra & Beans
email_chain.body:
Dear Andrea,

My name is Elvin from Lewis Commodities. We are looking to arrange a vessel from New Orleans to Kuwait towards the end of this month to lift a cargo of copra and beans. 

Could you please let me know your availability?

Many thanks,
Elvin

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry: New Orleans to Kuwait - Copra & Beans
email_chain.body:
Hello Andrea,

Following up on Elvin's email, regarding the availability of a vessel from New Orleans to Kuwait at the end of this month. 

Andrea's reply:

"Dear Ashley,
My ship can sail on the 31st of this month. I will arrange for the booking of your cargo after you have confirmed with your principal.
Please reply to my e-mail if you are interested in loading on my ship.
Regards,
Andrea"

Many thanks,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry: New Orleans to Kuwait - Copra & Beans
email_chain.body:
Hi Andrea,

The cargo booking with you will be confirmed once we receive final confirmation for the copra and beans load from our principal. We have already provisionally booked the vessel based on your availability.

We will also send you the list of copra and beans with their respective quantities once confirmed.

Thank you,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: Soybean Supplier Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Juan,

Could you please suggest a supplier for 12,500 MT of soybean from Jeddah to Tripoli?

Thanks so much!

Best,
Tamara

email_chain.subject: Soybean Inquiry - 50,000MT C&F Jeddah to Tripoli
email_chain.body:
Hi there!

I need 50,000 MT of soybean with C&F Jeddah to Tripoli for 2024-05-25 shipment.

Thank you for your offer!

Regards,
Sofiane

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Supplier Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hello Tamara,

We will be happy to provide you with 12,500 MT of soybean under FOB Jeddah on April 10th for $545 per ton.

Best regards,
The sales team at Mega Imports

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Inquiry - 50,000MT C&F Jeddah to Tripoli
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofiane,

Sorry, we cannot provide you with the quote you requested as this cargo will not be available until May.

Best regards,
The sales team at Mega Imports

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Supplier Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Tamara,

We regret that we cannot provide you with a quote at this time due to the unstable market.

Best regards,
The sales team at Mega Imports

email_chain.subject: Potential Methanol & Xylene Order
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Fitzpatrick,

Could you provide a quote for 4,000 MT of methanol, shipping from Grimsby to Ulsan? Also, are you able to ship 1,800 MT of xylene from Piraeus to Halifax this weekend? 

Please reply ASAP.

Sincerely,

Mr. Talbert
Ace Publishing, Inc.
Management

email_chain.subject: RE: Methanol Purchase Order Cancellation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fitzpatrick,

This email confirms the cancellation of the purchase order issued on December 1st for 4,000 MT of methanol, originally scheduled for delivery on or before January 5th, 2018. If we issue a new purchase order within the next two weeks, we would like to cancel the previous order.

Thank you, and we look forward to doing business with you again.

Sincerely,

Mr. Talbert
Ace Publishing, Inc.
Management

email_chain.subject: RE: Xylene Purchase Order Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fitzpatrick,

Thank you for the purchase order issued on December 10th for 2,000 MT of xylene. The order has been successfully received, and our staff has already started preparing the delivery contract. Please send your preferred contract form via email by December 16th.

Thank you again, and we look forward to doing business with you in the future.

Sincerely,

Mr. Talbert
Ace Publishing, Inc.
Management

email_chain.subject: RE: Xylene Shipment Update - Piraeus to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fitzpatrick,

Thank you for sending the purchase order for 1,200 MT of xylene from Piraeus. We will send you the shipment details via email as soon as the truck has reached our warehouse in Halifax.

We look forward to future collaborations.

Sincerely,

Mr. Talbert
Ace Publishing, Inc.
Management

email_chain.subject: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Zimmermann,

We are planning to ship 2,000 MT of soybean oil from London to Sao Paulo. Can you please provide an updated quote?

Many thanks,

Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,

We recommend sending 1,000 MT of soybean oil from London to Sao Paulo instead. This will be easier to handle and will result in a cost saving of approximately 10,000 British pounds based on our current offer.

Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,

Erik

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Hi Erik,

Could you clarify how you arrived at your best offer for my colleague, Shelly? Did you simply revise the initial email or was there something else involved?

Best regards,

Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,

I adjusted the pricing based on the revised quantity. 

Furthermore, I suggest including a statement that clarifies we cannot accommodate a shipment of 2,000 MT of soybean oil from London to Sao Paulo at this time.

Best regards,

Erik

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Hi Erik,

Is there a way to delete an email from my sent items? I'm trying to remove my previous message regarding how you sent the offer to Shelly.

Best regards,

Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Hi Shelly,

Unfortunately, there isn't a straightforward way to delete emails you've already sent. A workaround would be to open the message, remove the recipient, and create a new, self-addressed email with a cancellation or deletion request in the body.

Best regards,

Erik

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Dear Erik,

I think I understand. I'll try sending a cancellation message. Just trying to finalize this entire process.

Thanks,

Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,

Thanks for the reminder. I have resent the offer with the amended details.

Regards,

Erik

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Hi Erik,

Are we able to agree on a final price?

Best regards,

Shelly

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Oil Quote Request - London to Sao Paulo
email_chain.body:
Dear Shelly,

The initial offer for 1,000 MT is still valid.

Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Best regards,

Erik

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Steel Shipment from Tokyo to Cleveland
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mr. Jones,

Could you please confirm whether your vessel is capable of carrying 6,500 MT of steel from Tokyo to Cleveland? 

Also, I've noticed a pilotage fee of $2,500 quoted for Tsukaji to Tokyo. This is slightly below the usual charge of $2,750. Could I request a breakdown of the charges for Tsukaji to ensure I have a complete understanding of the costs?

Thanks,

Susan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Steel Shipment from Tokyo to Cleveland
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Miller,

Thank you for your message. 

Unfortunately, my vessel is not suitable to carry 6,500 MT of steel from Tokyo to Cleveland at the moment.

Regarding the quotation I gave you for pilotage, please note that it is subject to where the port of discharge will eventually be. The pilotage fee has been quoted from Tsukaji as this is the port of call that's on the vessel's I.P.

I'm sorry I cannot be of more help on the pilotage fee issue. 

Kind Regards,

Ian Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Steel Shipment from Tokyo to Cleveland
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Jones,

As you have already indicated, your vessel cannot carry 6,500 MT of steel from Tokyo to Cleveland. 

Could you please provide a breakdown of the pilotage fees for the Tsukaji port? I am awaiting a quotation from the port of Osaka regarding the ultimate port of discharge. Due to the port's congestion, it is uncertain when a berth will be available. I will ask them to confirm with the relevant operator and advise you immediately.

Kind regards,

Susan Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Steel Shipment from Tokyo to Cleveland
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Susan,

Could you please provide an update on your vessel's port of discharge and the port congestion situation in Osaka? I am waiting to hear back from the operators, but it appears they have been heavily overloaded with cargo this year. Your comments ASAP would be appreciated.

Also, could you please provide me with a breakdown of the pilotage fees as soon as possible. The carrier I use...

Thanks,

Ian

email_chain.subject: Vessel Booking Request: Dar es Salaam to Addis Ababa & Hamburg to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

We're loading approximately 7,000 MT of vegetables from Dar es Salaam to Addis Ababa on Monday. To reposition the vessel efficiently, would it be possible to book around 500 MT of steel mill products from Hamburg to Yokohama?

Could you also provide information on destination demurrage rates for Yokohama?

Best regards,

Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking Request: Dar es Salaam to Addis Ababa & Hamburg to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thanks for your message. I'll check on the destination demurrage rates for Yokohama and get back to you shortly.

The Hamburg-Malaga-East Africa trade lane is currently very competitive, with ship owners eager to keep their vessels employed. Unfortunately, my principal doesn't have any available steel mill capacity at the moment. I'll keep you informed if anything changes.

Best regards,

Zane

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking Request: Dar es Salaam to Addis Ababa & Hamburg to Yokohama - Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I just received an update from Hamburg. We may still be able to charter a vessel carrying steel mill products on the Hamburg-Malaga-East Africa trade for this Monday. I see one potential departure from Hamburg and another from Malaga, with a possible unloading location in Mombasa. We're working to reserve a vessel for this delivery, if needed.

Best regards,

Zane

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Booking Request: Dar es Salaam to Addis Ababa & Hamburg to Yokohama - Update
email_chain.body:
Dear Zane,

Sorry, my colleague Sarah requested the Hamburg to Yokohama booking. I appreciate your help.

Cheers,

Mika

email_chain.subject: Quote Request: Petrochemicals in Antwerp
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request: Petrochemicals in Antwerp
email_chain.body:
Dear Justin,

Our standard freight rate of EUR 145 is for a standard 10 m3 container from Noyers to Antwerp. For this shipment, with a volume of 100 m3, the applicable freight rate would be EUR 17,500.

Please inform me if you require any further information.

Best regards,

Zane

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry: 4200MT Shale - Rotterdam to Venice
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bravo,

Any chance you can arrange a charter for 4,200MT of shale from Rotterdam to Venice, loading next Thursday?

Regards,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry: 4200MT Shale - Rotterdam to Venice
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Following up on my previous email. Did I understand correctly that the M/V Lucie might be available?

Also, regarding potential future business: Would the M/V Jane be available on either Tuesday or Thursday of next week for a potential oil cargo?

Thanks,
Leslie

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry: 4200MT Shale - Rotterdam to Venice
email_chain.body:
Good morning, Leslie,

The Lucie is a vessel primarily used for diesel transport and has an operational capacity of around 5,000MT. I'm not sure we can source 4,200MT of diesel in Rotterdam for that timeframe.

Given that the M/V Phyllis typically loads around 4,000MT of diesel and the Phoenix is an even larger vessel, obtaining the quantity you require for that date presents a significant challenge. Let me look into availability and sourcing but I'm not optimistic.

Many thanks,
Mr. Bravo

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry: 4200MT Shale - Rotterdam to Venice
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

I think there may be some confusion. The initial request was for 4,200MT of shale from Rotterdam to Venice. My apologies for not being clearer.

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry: 4200MT Shale - Rotterdam to Venice
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

Please don't misunderstand; I understand the complexities of the supply chain.

I'm simply assisting my customer in finding a suitable shipping vessel for shale. I'm not implying that you can easily acquire 4,200MT of diesel; I'm just trying to explore all available options.

email_chain.subject: Corrugated Sheet Shipment - Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

We're working on the design for a 50,000 MT shipment of corrugated sheets from Qingdao to New York. Could you confirm if you can handle this volume as is, or if we need to adjust the delivery dates?

Yours,
Mikaela Lundqvist

email_chain.subject: RE: Corrugated Sheet Shipment - Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

Thanks for your prompt response. To confirm our payment terms, we can only pay by EFT. How soon can you initiate the transfer process?

Regards,
Mikaela Lundqvist

email_chain.subject: RE: Corrugated Sheet Shipment - Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikaela,

I'm sorry, but we typically don't accept EFT payments due to internal accounting procedures. As a reminder, our handling fee has already been deducted from the quoted price.

Yours,
Boris Volkov

email_chain.subject: RE: Corrugated Sheet Shipment - Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

Your email surprises me. We had previously discussed EFT payments as our standard method. To avoid any delays, please provide our bank details so we can initiate an EFT transfer. Kindly confirm once the transaction proceeds.

Regards,
Mikaela Lundqvist

email_chain.subject: RE: Corrugated Sheet Shipment - Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikaela,

I'm sorry, but I'm afraid our bank might charge you a penalty for premature payment, given the agreed schedule.

Yours,
Boris Volkov

email_chain.subject: RE: Corrugated Sheet Shipment - Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Boris,

This is rather unusual. Apologies for my impatience. Could you provide an estimated timeframe for when I can expect your response regarding the bank details?

Regards,
Mikaela Lundqvist

email_chain.subject: RE: Corrugated Sheet Shipment - Qingdao to New York
email_chain.body:
Hi Mikaela,

I am very sorry for the confusion and delay. We've been extremely busy with several other clients. I will send you our bank details for an EFT transfer by Monday. We would greatly appreciate your help with this order.

Regards,
Boris

email_chain.subject: Methanol Shipment Enquiry - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Can we book a slot to ship 8,400 MT of methanol from India to Chile? We'd like to load around noon on Sunday, with a laycan by Friday this week. If this works for you, please confirm the details and send a proforma invoice.

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol Shipment Enquiry - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Thanks for the enquiry. We can accommodate your cargo with a 7-day laycan from India to Chile.

We will send a proforma invoice for 1 MT as a sample to confirm specifications. If this is acceptable, please reply with your banking details for payment processing and we will follow up with a proforma for the full amount.

Thanks,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol Shipment Enquiry - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Our bank is IndusInd Bank, Mumbai.

Please send the proforma with the relevant information.

Thanks,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Methanol Shipment Enquiry - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

I apologize for the misunderstanding. We've noticed that IndusInd Bank does not readily process US dollar transfers for payments to India. We also noted an discrepancy in your FOB pricing; your quoted price of $350 appears to be for rupees at an exchange rate of INR 72, not US dollars. Our total requirement of 8,400 MT would then be equivalent to roughly $3.2 million USD at current exchange rates.

To clarify payment matters, we can ship 300 MT every two weeks for five months.

I will convert these prices to rupees and then send a revised proforma invoice.

Best,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Proforma Invoice for Methanol Shipment - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

Please see the attached proforma invoice for 300 MT of methanol at INR 71,249 per MT. We will ship your first load of methanol on 14 November 2018.

Your next three loads will be due 28 November, 12 December, and 26 December 2018.

Your total requirement will be 8,400 MT, which is worth approximately $3.2 million at our current exchange rates.

I have also enclosed a copy of our credit application form, which I will process to send you a formal letter of credit (LC). Please sign and return this form, and I will attach it to your LC for immediate processing.

Best,
Rahul

email_chain.subject: Re: Proforma Invoice for Methanol Shipment - India to Chile
email_chain.body:
Hi Rahul,

Thanks for your detailed reply.

We need to finalize the contract before the weekend, so please confirm that the terms are as listed.

email_chain.subject: Potential Shipment: Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Davidson,

You mentioned you'd consider a voyage from Singapore to Phuket using our services. To better understand your needs, could you confirm some details? We've noted a similar shipment volume from Vigo to La Rochelle last month. Would a similar capacity be suitable for a shipment in the first week of October?

Thanks,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Potential Shipment: Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello James,

Sorry for the delay, I seem to have missed your initial email. I need some clarification. Could you please specify:

- What is the container size you are offering?
- What is the total weight capacity you can accommodate?
- Is your service able to handle both Vigo to La Rochelle and Vigo to Phuket?

Please respond ASAP.
Thanks,
Janet

email_chain.subject: Re: Potential Shipment: Singapore to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Davidson,

I understand you need confirmation regarding our ability to handle a 20-foot container from Vigo to La Rochelle. We are certainly equipped to manage this delivery, ensuring complete satisfaction for you and your customer, even if the final destination is Phuket.

Please call me at 555-555-1212 with the weight of your cargo so we can finalize the details.

Regards,
Fred

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Change to Shipping Request - Vigo to Phuket
email_chain.body:
Hello Fred,

You may recall our previous inquiry about a 20-foot container from Vigo to La Rochelle. However, our requirements have changed. We now need a full load 20-foot container shipped from Vigo directly to Phuket.

We require a decision within the next 24 hours. Please confirm whether you are able to handle this specific route and timeline. Responsiveness is crucial for us.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Follow-up - Vigo to Phuket 20ft Container
email_chain.body:
Hi Fred,

Following up on our phone conversation last week regarding the potential Vigo to La Rochelle shipment. We now urgently require transport for a 20-foot container from Vigo to Phuket.

Time is of the essence. Please confirm within the next 24 hours if this service is available.

Please call me at 555-555-1212.

Thanks,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Decision Required: Vigo to La Rochelle Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Fred,

I'm reviewing our email correspondence over the past two months regarding the 20-foot container shipment from Vigo to La Rochelle. I need a definitive 'yes' or 'no' from you. We are choosing between your company and a competitor, and I need to make a decision today. The shipment is ready to go on Monday or Tuesday.

Regards,

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Re: Fertilizer Quote Request - Hamriyah to Rabigh
email_chain.body: As mentioned in my email of [Date - Replace with actual date, presumably earlier than 2024-03-01] can you please confirm your best price for 1,000MT of fertilizer by Tuesday 5pm?

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Potential Changes to Alaska Ethanol Tax
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Jones/Harrison,

We understand that a change in the Alaska state tax ruling could affect our decision to ship ethanol to Alaska. Could you please inform us how the pending decision will change the rate structure for ethanol, and when we can expect these changes to take effect?

Thank you,

Oliver

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Potential Changes to Alaska Ethanol Tax
email_chain.body:
Dear Oliver,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding potential changes to the Alaska ethanol tax. Please find attached a document outlining the proposed changes and their potential impact on ethanol shipments. This document includes information about the new rate structure and the anticipated effective date.

Please review the attached document, and if you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Sincerely,

Mollie Harrison
Regional Manager
Alaska State Tax Department

email_chain.subject: Alaska fuel tax on ethanol
email_chain.body:
As a company committed to helping Alaska achieve energy independence by supporting the development and production of cleaner, lower-emission fuels, we need your support to maintain our rates for ethanol and fuel additives shipped to Alaska.

Currently, we’re only able to offer discounted ethanol and additive rates because the Alaska fuel tax does not differentiate between ethanol and petroleum-based products. However, this is set to change if a new state law is passed, which will allow ethanol to be taxed at 60 percent of the full price.

As a result, we would need to adjust our current rates to reflect this new tax. We can absorb the tax until June 30, 2013, but if the current rate structure changes after that date, your fuel costs will increase significantly to reflect the new tax rate.

While we understand that a new tax structure may be needed, we ask for your support in ensuring that ethanol maintains an competitive rate so we can continue supplying Alaskans.

email_chain.subject: FW: Alaska fuel tax on ethanol
email_chain.body:
Please find attached our email response from Pacific Ethanol, a supplier of ethanol and biodiesel to the Alaska state fuel tax department, regarding a potential change in the state tax ruling in Alaska. This could affect our decision to ship ethanol there.

[Link to Pacific Ethanol email on corporate website]

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry: 3,400 MT Adhesives - Rotterdam to Lübeck
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lie,

We require a shipment of 3,400 MT of adhesives from Rotterdam to Lübeck in early October. Could you please advise on your earliest available loading date?

Best regards,

Jan Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 3,400 MT Adhesives - Rotterdam to Lübeck
email_chain.body:
Hello Jan,

Thank you for your email. Our earliest loading date for 3,400 MT is October 4th. However, please note that this falls on a Monday, which is typically a slower start to the week.

To potentially expedite the shipment, we could explore loading on October 1st or 2nd. The October 1st option would utilize our limited summer sailing schedule and require a larger vessel than usual. The October 2nd option is within our regular schedule, but the vessel is currently heavily booked, which could impact throughput.

We can confirm the definite loading date by October 7th. Would you like me to investigate either the October 1st or 2nd options? Knowing your preference will allow us to provide a more accurate invoice.

Best regards,

Lie Best

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Urea Fertilizer Aqaba to Lattakia - 3000 MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Smed,

I'd like to inquire about a shipment of 3,000 MT of urea fertilizer from Aqaba to Lattakia next week. Do you have a suitable vessel with available slot?

Could you also let me know the demurrage rate per day for delays?

Looking forward to your reply.

Regards,
Kyle

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Urea Fertilizer Aqaba to Lattakia - 3000 MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Kyle,

Thanks for your email. Apologies for the delayed response; things have been quite hectic here.

To ensure a prompt and accurate quote, could you please provide the following details:

*   Confirmation of the cargo quantity: Is it exactly 3,000 MT?
*   What is the MOIC (Marine Oil Intercompany Code)?
*   Do you have a confirmed berth reservation in Aqaba?
*   Do you have a proforma invoice for the cargo?
*   What are the agreed Incoterms? Specifically, regarding responsibility at Aqaba (e.g., FCA Aqaba)?
*   Do you have carrier waybill?
*   What are the Bill of Lading (B/L) number and House Air Waybill (HAWB) number?

Once I have this information, I can check vessel availability and alternative port options to optimize our service and potentially reduce your overall shipping costs.

Thanks,
Best Regards,
Frank

email_chain.subject: Email Template Issue - Debugging Assistance
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

I'm writing to address the email template issues you're experiencing.

You've created a template '1' as follows:

```
{{Name}}
Dear {{Name}}
{{Message 1}}
{{Message 2}}
Regards
{{Name}}
```

And then attempting to use it in 'Email 3':

```
{{Email 1}}
```

The email you are trying to generate with this configuration is:

```
Mr. Warren
Dear Mr. Warren,
When your ship arrives in New Orleans, we would like to send you 50 tons of industrial chemicals by truck. Could you please give me the following information?
What truck dimensions does your ship have, and is it subject to any fees? If so, what are they and how are they calculated?
Do you have any spare capacity?
Thanks in advance for your information.
Regards,
Tom
```

Remember to use proper variable substitutions when defining the template. If you need more help, please feel free to ask.

email_chain.subject: Email Template Issue - Continued
email_chain.body:
Test Email - Open this link to receive this test email: <http://www.emailx.net/en/testemail.htm>

You can see the error if you preview the page:

The {{#if condition}} was detected in {{Email 3}} template, but is always true and cannot be prevented with: {{! condition|empty}}

Because the condition is not empty, it doesn't print anything, so there's nothing to replace with a fallback.

email_chain.subject: Email Template Issue - Debugging Assistance - Final
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

You are now testing with Email 4:

```
{{Email 3}}
```
And now testing with Email 5:
```
{{Email 2}}
```
```
{{Email 4}}
```

email_chain.body:

Mike

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Mike,

Thank you for your prompt response. We're pleased to hear you're willing to consider our freight. I believe we can agree on the price.

Please find the details below:

*   **Location:** The Pasir Panjang Terminal, Singapore
*   **Port:** Singapore
*   **Cargo Mode:** Bulk cargo
*   **Unit of Measure:** Tonnes
*   **Loadout Start Date:** November 1st, 2018
*   **Loadout End Date:** November 2nd, 2018
*   **Number of Containers:** 4,724 units (This is a containerized portion of the bulk)
*   **Number of Cargo Items:** 6,756 items (Individual packages within the containers)
*   **Quantity:** 248 tonnes
*   **Unit Price per Ton:** $1,500.00

Regarding freight payment, we are willing to cover 70% of the total freight cost upfront.

Thank you again for your consideration. We look forward to a successful collaboration.

Best Regards,

Lina

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry
email_chain.body:

Regarding your offer to cover 70% of the freight, could you please clarify which specific components of the cargo this percentage would apply to? For example, is this 70% for specific items, or is this based on a portion of the total cargo weight?

email_chain.body:

To provide you with an accurate quote, could you please provide further details such as the specific port of loading and unloading, cargo type, and any other relevant information?

Regards,

Manager

email_chain.body:

email_chain.body:

Regards,
Manager

email_chain.subject: STP Inquiry - 3000 MT Paper - Barcelona to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Hi Stuart,

Would you be able to confirm your earliest date for a short-term period (STP) charter for 3,000 MT of paper from Barcelona to Casablanca?

Also, do you charge for providing expert advice on terminal rules at either port?

With best regards,

Ray Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: STP Inquiry - 3000 MT Paper - Barcelona to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Dear Ray,

Thank you for your enquiry. I am sorry to inform you that our Operations team currently has no availability for new STP charters until January. 

Our charter rates can be viewed on the rate page of our website (please see link below), and these are subject to Standard Charters Terms & Conditions.

As you will note, the rates are offered on a per-direction basis. While we will be charging two-way rates, we will allow a few days turnaround at sea between the outward and return legs of the voyage.

Regarding your question about terminal rules advice, we do not charge for this service.

We will contact you again once availability has been confirmed and our rates have been reconfirmed for January.

Kind regards,

Vassili Kakias

[Link to Rate Page] Contact Us | Privacy Policy | Terms of Use | Terms of Sale | Cookie Policy

email_chain.subject: Re: STP Inquiry - 3000 MT Paper - Barcelona to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Dear Vassili,

Thanks for confirming your availablity to give advice on terminal rules. We have been doing a cost benefit analysis

email_chain.subject: Express Charter Inquiry & Cargo Consolidation
email_chain.body:
Dear Stuart,

I trust you are well.

I was hoping you could help me with the following:

1.  Is it possible to combine freight items on an express charter? If so, what rates apply?

2.  I also have a query regarding return slots and consolidation of cargo. We would like to consolidate 3 flights of around 500 kgs each onto one flight. This will reduce the number of flights required, associated costs, and delivery times. What would be a reasonable timeframe for us to request this service (3-4 days' notice)?

Kind regards,

Kurt Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Express Charter Inquiry & Cargo Consolidation
email_chain.body:
Dear Kurt,

Thank you for your enquiry.

Regarding your first query: if you have two destinations and only want to travel once per cargo item, and your total freight exceeds 3,000kg, there will be a minimum charge of $5,000 to classify your freight as Standard Charters freight (see the link below for full information).

Regarding your second query: the standard charter turnaround is 40 days per trip. For the return leg from airport to airport, we will allow up to 5 days turnaround. Generally, 3-4 days should be sufficient time to collect your cargo, unless you prefer to wait and collect everything together.

Kind regards,

Vassili Kakias

[Link to Standard Charters Information] Contact Us | Privacy Policy | Terms of Use | Terms of Sale | Cookie Policy

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Lagos to Benin - Tea and Sugar
email_chain.body:

I'm looking to book freight from Lagos to Benin for tea and sugar. Could you please provide a freight quote? Also, is 14 days a realistic estimate for transit time?

Thanks,
Jenny

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Lagos to Benin - Tea and Sugar
email_chain.body:
Dear Jenny,

The freight from Lagos to Benin should be approximately 500 USD. A transit time of 14 days is generally achievable, but please keep in mind that customs clearance at both ends can add a few days. 

For information regarding customs procedures in Benin, you might find details on the consignee's online platforms. Alternatively, contacting them directly would likely provide insights into local clearance times.

Best regards,
Mary

email_chain.subject: Dar es Salaam Cargo Update
email_chain.body:
The proposed cargo shipment to Dar es Salaam is currently on hold due to concerns about market liquidity.

Best,
Rami

email_chain.subject: Re: Dar es Salaam Cargo Update
email_chain.body:
Rami,

I received your email yesterday. Further research indicates the market situation shouldn't be a significant threat to shipping the furniture. This issue was just one of several delaying the operation's start.

We are compiling a comprehensive list of all issues and our proposed solutions, which will be included in a full presentation sent to you in two weeks.

Thank you for your assistance in potentially moving the furniture. I've informed your colleagues. We appreciate your help.

Malia

email_chain.subject: Re: Dar es Salaam Cargo Update
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Please let me know if you have any further questions. I'm happy to assist with resolving issues like this.

It's not enough to simply have a good idea. It needs to resonate with people and offer a new perspective.

While the solution might seem complex, it's ultimately worthwhile.

Feel free to reach out if there's anything I can do to help. Thank you.

email_chain.subject: Delivery Order - Dar es Salaam Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello,

Here is the breakdown of payments:

1.  $50 for shipping - please send directly to the Seattle account.
2.  $80 for payment of taxes and duties - please send directly to the Dar es Salaam account.
3.  $50 for initial hire - split between the Seattle and Dar es Salaam accounts (please confirm the split before sending)

Please ensure the payments are processed in the order listed to avoid financial discrepancies.

Thank you for your help,
Malia

email_chain.subject: Re: Delivery Order - Dar es Salaam Shipment
email_chain.body:
