email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Request: 12,000 MT Copper Cathodes - Fujian to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
We have a 12,000 MT copper cathode shipment ready for transport from Fujian to Rotterdam, ready to load in approximately 6 days. Could you please advise your best freight rate? Also, please let me know if weekend loadings are acceptable at the origin port.

Thank you,

Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Request: 12,000 MT Copper Cathodes - Fujian to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your inquiry. Please find below our FOB quotation to Rotterdam Port. Let me know if you have any questions.

Origin Port: Guangzhou
Destination Port: Rotterdam
Transit Time: 12 days
Volume: 6 MT (Note: This appears to be a typo and should likely reflect a higher amount. Please confirm if 12,000 MT is correct, as originally stated.)

Rate Quotation (FOB Rotterdam):
USD 2611 / MT

Comment: Please kindly confirm if the price fits your requirement. Our customer is responsible for all handling costs at the port of origin.

Sincerely,
Shipping Department

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Request: 12,000 MT Copper Cathodes - Fujian to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Shipping Department,

Thank you for your prompt reply. Apologies, it seems there was a typo from your side regarding the amount being 6MT instead of 12,000 MT. 

We will definitely accept your FCA price after we confirm the correct MT rate. We will have two more consignments to Shanghai in about 10-20 days and wanted to learn if this is the best you could do for a delivery from Suzhou to Rotterdam port? Contact us, because your job is not just to find the cheapest solution but to find the solution that is the right price and the best way to use.

Contact us, because your job is not just to find the cheapest solution but to find the solution that is the right price and the best way to use.

Telephone: 13396127727

Regards,

Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Request: 12,000 MT Copper Cathodes - Fujian to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Thanks for your message, Alex.

Rotterdam is indeed a very good port for us to receive cargo. Could you reconfirm if you have also opened up a new forwarder in China? If we do not have any other consignments until next year, maybe you will send me a very good deal.

Best Regards,
Shipping Department

email_chain.subject: Cement Order - Vancouver to Gothenburg
email_chain.body:
Hi,

I would like to place an order for cement from the Vancouver area to Gothenburg, Sweden. Could you please provide a freight estimate for this shipment? Also, do you have a commercial invoice and a pro-forma invoice available so I can pay via wire transfer?

Kind regards,
Ari

email_chain.subject: Re: Cement Order - Vancouver to Gothenburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Ari,

You are correct, we can offer you a delivery time of approximately two weeks from Canada to Sweden, as we expect to secure space on a cargo airline next week. I will send you the commercial and pro-forma invoices shortly.

Kind regards,
Alexander

email_chain.subject: Re: Cement Order - Vancouver to Gothenburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Thank you. We will send the cement next week, but will let you know the confirmed dates once we get a reservation for you on the cargo airline.

Kind regards,
Ari

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - 800 MT Cement Vancouver to Malmo
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Sir,

I just received your email, and I understand the urgency regarding the cement shipment. 
You are correct, that was a last-minute request for another client. I believe this is the first time that cement has been requested to be sent by air to Sweden. I have contacted my supply chain, and I am still waiting on the ETA.
In fact, we did not even get a shipment to be sent to the forwarder. So I am working with my colleagues in the next couple of hours to get this shipment done, and hope to hear from them soon.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - 800 MT Cement Vancouver to Malmo
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

I just wanted to let you know that I was able to arrange a shipment of cement for you. We are sending an 8 MT sample shipment initially, with the remaining 792 MT to follow. We will confirm the exact date and time for the main shipment shortly.

email_chain.subject: Cement Sample Received - Malmo
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

Thank you for your email. We received your sample shipment from the airport in Malmo, Sweden, on the 5th of September.

Thank you,
Johannes

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment - Constanta to Beirut
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment - Constanta to Beirut
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment - Constanta to Beirut
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment - Constanta to Beirut
email_chain.body:

I have just been advised that the seller is unable to receive payments via bank transfer or PayPal. The only payment option is Western Union. Please proceed with this method, and I will provide the sender's information tomorrow.

Yours,
Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment - Constanta to Beirut
email_chain.body:
Hi Yasmine,

The seller has informed me that he is unable to receive Western Union transfers in Romania.

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment - Constanta to Beirut
email_chain.body:
Takemura,

I can make the payment via bank wire within a week. 

Yours,
Yasmine

email_chain.subject: Re: Barley Shipment - Constanta to Beirut

The general market rate has been around $20 per ton, but it's fluctuating depending on weather conditions. A good approximation would be $23 per ton.

Regarding demurrage, our preference is $4.00 per day + $1.50 per hour. Also, would you be able to ship to the Pier 84 terminal in New York City?

email_chain.subject: RE: Following Up: 3,000MT Nonferrous Metals - Hakata to New York

Thank you,
David Mercer

email_chain.subject: FREYSSINET Order and Supply Chain Solutions
email_chain.body:
Dear Gomes,

We noticed your recent order for FREYSSINET products and wanted to reach out. Are you planning any further shipments in the near future? Shipper Logistics specializes in providing reliable supply chain solutions with strict ETA adherence.

Our project teams have extensive experience working with organizations of your size, and we're confident we can guarantee timely delivery of your goods. We'd be happy to discuss how we can optimize your shipping process.

Sincerely,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: FREYSSINET Order and Supply Chain Solutions
email_chain.body:
James,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate you taking the time to review our recent order and offer your services. 

I'm exploring different options for managing our freight and your suggestion about using an agent or consultant is interesting. I initially handled the order myself to try and save costs, but I realize there might be efficiencies I'm missing. Perhaps engaging an agent could indeed secure a better price than I was able to find independently. 

I'm impressed with your proactive analysis and am open to considering different approaches. 

Sincerely,
Gomes

email_chain.subject: Re: FREYSSINET Order and Supply Chain Solutions
email_chain.body:
James,

Thanks again for your quick response. Your email was very informative.

I'm particularly interested in your idea of using an agent or consultant. I did some preliminary research and understand that you sometimes utilize consultants for around 10% of your orders. This is encouraging, as it indicates you have experience with this model. We believe that the savings on fees through a consultant or agent could significantly improve our bottom line.

Would you be available to discuss this further? I'd like to explore the potential benefits and how your organization might facilitate this arrangement.

Sincerely,
Gomes

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry: 3000MT Transformers - Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body:
Hello Dave,

We need to move 3,000MT of transformers from Tianjin to Colombo within the next two months. Could you please advise on your lead times and rates for this shipment?

Sincerely,
Sue Chen

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 3000MT Transformers - Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body:
Hi Sue,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding shipping services. We can certainly assist you with transporting your transformers from Tianjin to Colombo. 

To provide you with an accurate quote and lead time, could you please provide more specific details regarding the cargo dimensions and any special handling requirements?

We offer a range of services, including customs clearance at both origin and destination. 

I look forward to hearing from you.

Yours faithfully,
Dave Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 3000MT Transformers - Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body:
Hi Dave,

Before providing those details, would it be possible to arrange for a pickup of a sample package from my residence to your depot? I would like to inspect your facility before booking the full shipment. Could you please provide the address of your warehouse?

Regards,
Sue Chen

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 3000MT Transformers - Tianjin to Colombo
email_chain.body:
Hi Sue,

Thank you for your request. Our main receiving warehouse is located at:

123 Shipping Lane,
Eastport Industrial Park,
Tianjin, China

Please let me know when you plan to send the sample package so we can be ready to receive it. Once we receive the sample, and dimensions of the full shipment, I can provide a detailed quote and lead time.

Yours sincerely,
Dave Miller

email_chain.subject: Shipping Inquiry: 9,800 MT Palm Oil - Mataro to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Pinto,

Could you please suggest the best way to ship 9,800 MT of palm oil from Mataro to Dar es Salaam?

Regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 9,800 MT Palm Oil - Mataro to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Dear Victor,

Thanks for your email.

We will be happy to get back to you in one business day with our suggestions.

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 9,800 MT Palm Oil - Mataro to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

We really appreciate your email.

Could you please suggest which method will be the fastest way to get the oil to Dar es Salaam?

Regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 9,800 MT Palm Oil - Mataro to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Dear Victor,

First of all, you have made a very good decision picking us as your preferred carrier. We will be very glad to get your cargo to Dar es Salaam.

For this shipment size, we recommend using our "Fast Liner" service. This is generally the fastest option we offer.

Please note that the "Fast Liner" service transit time does not include any delays caused by Customs. If you want to expedite your cargo through customs in Dar es Salaam, please let us know and we can discuss options for customs brokerage services.

Kind Regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 9,800 MT Palm Oil - Mataro to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello Victor,

Thank you for considering the "Fast Liner" method. To expedite the payment and import clearance process, would you mind sending us your company's credit application? Please also provide a copy of your passport or national ID for KYC purposes.

Please note that this documentation is crucial for us to efficiently process your cargo.

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 9,800 MT Palm Oil - Mataro to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Please find attached the credit application and a copy of my passport for your information.

I am looking forward to receiving your confirmation and shipment details soon.

Regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 9,800 MT Palm Oil - Mataro to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello Victor,

Just to be sure, what is your target delivery date in Dar es Salaam?

In addition, could you please tell us how long it typically takes your bank to process international payments, once initiated?

Kind regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 9,800 MT Palm Oil - Mataro to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I have received your documents, and I appreciate the prompt service. Please let me know the estimated transit time for the cargo to reach Dar es Salaam.

I am expecting delivery by the end of next week (November 9th, 2023), so timely communication is important to help me meet my targets.

Regards,
Victor

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: 9,800 MT Palm Oil - Mataro to Dar es Salaam
email_chain.body:
Hello Victor,

Thanks for sending us your documents. We received them on Friday and have started processing your cargo. It will take approximately five business days to get the shipment ready for departure from Mataro.

Please keep in mind that this is just an estimate, as unforeseen circumstances (weather, port congestion) could potentially impact the schedule.

Kind Regards,
John Pinto

email_chain.subject: Fertilizer Inquiry - Durban to Farquhar
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Haugland,

How’s business?

I’m in the market for 4,000 MT of fertilizers from Durban to Farquhar. What’s your best rate?

Regards,
Gunnar

email_chain.subject: Re: Fertilizer Inquiry - Durban to Farquhar
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Gunnar,

We have a vessel with a bulk shipment destined for New Zealand that is currently docked at Durban. The vessel is due to depart on February 20th and has capacity to load 5,000 MT of fertilizer.

Would you be interested in a price of $35.00 per MT for shipment to Farquhar?

Regards,
Richard.

email_chain.subject: Re: Fertilizer Inquiry - Durban to Farquhar
email_chain.body:
Hi Richard,

The vessel schedule works for us. We are happy to load your shipment. We can offer a competitive price of $33.50 per MT. We have the product ready in our warehouse. We are offering Fertigo 18-26-0.

Do you have any specific requirements for the fertilizer blend? If not, we can supply other combinations. Also, if you need to specify quantities for particular customers, please inform me. I will get back to you by Monday with final details.

Regards,
Haugland

email_chain.subject: Re: Fertilizer Inquiry - Durban to Farquhar
email_chain.body:
Mr. Haugland,

I'm ready to load the shipment on Thursday or Friday. I would like to load 1,500 MT for our first customer, 2,000 MT for our second customer and 500 MT for our third customer. 

Do you have any questions? We can call on Thursday if you prefer. I need to contact the shipping company immediately to secure your order on the vessel. It is almost full, and we need to space your cargo carefully.

I'm ready to discuss any load strategy that you may require. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or concerns.

Regards,
Richard.

email_chain.subject: Re: Fertilizer Inquiry - Durban to Farquhar
email_chain.body:
Mr. Haugland,

We appreciate your time in responding to our inquiries. We have made a final decision regarding your offer. We are confirming 2,500 MT of Fertigo 18-26-0, which meets our customers' requirements.

We are still interested in the initial 4,000 MT load you offered, but at $33.00 per MT. If you can confirm this, we can proceed immediately.

We need to be flexible with the load strategy. It is our first load to Farquhar Island, so we have to carefully manage the weight distribution on the vessel to ensure a safe journey. We will not load more than 30% of the cargo on deck.

I have sent you a separate email with our customer details for confirmation purposes.

Regards,
Richard

email_chain.body:
Dear Richard,

I’m glad to hear that your order of...

email_chain.subject: Ethanol Storage Request - Riyadh
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Yamaguchi,

Our client has just transferred a shipment of ethanol to your tank in Riyadh. Unfortunately, they won't receive the shipper’s IRB (Import Release Booking) until next week. 

Could you please hold the cargo in the tank under DAF (Delivered at Frontier) terms for 48 hours free of charge while we await the permit? 

Best regards,

Paddy

email_chain.subject: RE: Ethanol Storage Request - Riyadh
email_chain.body:
Dear Paddy,

The Client just received the IRB from Saudi customs. Transportation is proceeding to the port, and the shipper is awaiting cargo discharge.

However, according to our Saudi agent, the port is experiencing low manpower, potentially delaying unloading. The cargo is expected to arrive in Riyadh within 48 hours. 

Could you ask Mr. Yamaguchi to hold the cargo in the tank under DAF terms for another 48 hours? I'm afraid we cannot wait any longer without incurring charges.

Thanks.

Best regards,

Jon

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Steel Shipment from Hebei to Jeddah

Thanks for your time,
Tommy

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Steel Shipment from Hebei to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Thanks for your email. Unfortunately, we are unable to proceed with the full vessel option at this time due to storage limitations in Saudi Arabia. 

We do, however, have an urgent requirement for a smaller shipment.

Could you confirm your earliest laycan dates and rates for the following:

1000 MT of steel in 40' High Cube (HC) containers to Saudi Arabia.

Thank you for your time,
Tommy

email_chain.body:

1000 MT of steel in 40' HC containers to Saudi Arabia.

Thank you,
Tommy

Regards,
Tommy

1000 MT of steel in 40' HC containers to Saudi Arabia.

Tommy

Tommy

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Rotterdam to Algeciras - 6,000 MT Raw Material
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Captain Schuppe,

We are planning to ship 6,000 MT of raw material from Rotterdam to Algeciras. Could you please advise on available laycan slots, as well as provide a freight quote, including any additional charges?

Regards,

Ryan

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Rotterdam to Algeciras - 6,000 MT Raw Material
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Captain Schuppe,

We have been receiving bids from several vessels: Exxpresser, Futura, Goya, Super Valiant, Tyra, and Valspar. 

To clarify, could you please confirm that your pilot services are available to vessels loading 6,000 MT at Rotterdam?

Regards,

Ryan

email_chain.subject: Exxpresser - Rotterdam Loading and Algeciras Discharge
email_chain.body:
Good Afternoon Captain Schuppe,

Our vessel, the Exxpresser, is scheduled to arrive in Rotterdam in 8 days, approximately July 1st at 13:30 Rotterdam time. We are planning to discharge her cargo in Algeciras. Could you please provide information on the following:

*   How will we communicate with your pilot once the vessel is ready to load?
*   What is your standard payment procedure for pilotage services?
*   What is the weekly rate for your pilot services?
*   Do you have a safety management system (SMS) in place onboard?

Regards,

Ryan

email_chain.subject: RE: Exxpresser - Rotterdam Loading and Algeciras Discharge
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Captain Schuppe,

Thank you for providing your pilotage offer, safety system details, checklists, and safety instructions. This information has been forwarded to our client for review.

We have encountered a situation that needs clarification before proceeding further. Our regular pilot is unexpectedly unavailable to attend the port. Would you be available to pilot the Exxpresser on July 1st?

Regards,

Ryan

email_chain.subject: URGENT: Exxpresser - Rotterdam Pilot Availability
email_chain.body:
Hello Captain Schuppe,

As of June 30th, our designated port pilot for the Exxpresser in Rotterdam is unexpectedly unavailable. We are currently unsure of the duration of this issue. We are awaiting further information from the cargo owners and our client regarding contingency plans.

We will provide you with an update as soon as possible. In the meantime, please remain available.

Regards,

Ryan

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: Mombasa to Dar Es Salaam
email_chain.body:

Jason

email_chain.subject: Regarding U.S. Presidential Election
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,

We are still waiting for your response regarding the U.S. Presidential elections. Please advise by Monday.

Thanks,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding U.S. Presidential Election
email_chain.body:
Cassie,

Thank you for your email dated 23/10/19. Following our party's success in the recent U.S. elections, where we won the most seats and I've been asked to form the government, I wanted to update you on our plans for the $100,000 gift from the Party Unity Coalition.

We plan to use the initial contribution to fundraise for the initial payrolls of employees and contractors in the new government. We will then contribute a further $50,000 each month to this effort for a period of 4 months.

Regarding your boss's offer to fundraise a further $500,000 and to make the contributions tax-deductible, given the unique situation with the U.S. tax system, we will need to discuss the best approach to ensure compliance.

Best regards,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding U.S. Presidential Election - Party Unity Coalition Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Thanks for your email. It's good to be in touch about this.

As you requested, I am sending you an attached email with details and contact information for Mr. Marcus Barnes at the Party Unity Coalition. I will follow up with them and keep you in the loop.

Let me know if you have any other questions and I look forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding U.S. Presidential Election - Party Unity Coalition Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Thank you for your email dated 30/10/19. Attached you'll find the email correspondence with Mr. Marcus Barnes from the Party Unity Coalition. To summarize our financial arrangement, the Party Unity Coalition will initially provide $50,000 each month for 4 months, then top up these initial contributions with a further $50,000 each month for 3 months. Thereafter, contributions will continue at $50,000 each month for the subsequent 3 months. This makes the total contributions $50,000 x 4 + 50,000 x 3 + 50,000 x 3 = $500,000. The contributions will be used to fundraise for the initial payrolls of employees and contractors in the new government and to cover subsequent months.

Regarding the tax-deductible status and your boss's offer, I have discussed this with Mr. Barnes to ensure compliance given the unique U.S. tax situation.

Best regards,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding U.S. Presidential Election - Party Unity Coalition Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Milt,

Thanks for getting back to me. I have forwarded your email to my manager, Inga. I can confirm that our company will make a contribution of $500,000 to support your election campaign as you had hoped. We will also ensure the contribution is tax-deductible.

I have attached the email with the details of the funds and contributions that we plan to make.

Best,
Cassie

email_chain.subject: Party Unity Coalition Fundraising
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Your team has raised $220,000 from the Party Unity Coalition to date. I will be sending an invoice to the Coalition to confirm the arrangement and look forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Invoice for Party Unity Coalition Fundraising
email_chain.body:
Hi Cassie,

Thanks for getting back to me. Please accept our invoice for $220,000 (including $50,000 to be distributed over the next 4 months). We would like to make the payment to...

Thanks,
Milt

email_chain.subject: Gasoline Shipment Request - Baku to Al Sharqia
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bernard,

I am planning a shipment of 2,800 MT of gasoline from Baku to Al Sharqia. I anticipate there may be delays at the port. Could you please explain your company's procedures for accounting for such potential delays in the overall delivery timeline?

Thank you,
Linda Johnson

email_chain.subject: Regarding Gasoline Examination and Invoice Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bernard,

Please do not include tank measurement numbers on the invoices you provide. We will be conducting an examination of the delivered gasoline and require an accurate record of the quantity received for verification. I would appreciate it if you could send updated invoice copies without the tank measurement numbers.

Thank you,
Anna Kovalenko

email_chain.subject: Urgent Gasoline Order - Tripoli
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bernard,

We require an urgent shipment of 1,200 MT of gasoline to Tripoli. Our existing contract with another supplier for 2,400 MT has been affected by transportation delays, leaving us with a significant shortfall. Due to budgetary constraints, we can only afford to purchase 1,200 MT at this time to address the immediate shortage.

We hope you can assist us and ensure immediate delivery of this fuel.

Thank you,
Anna Kovalenko

email_chain.subject: Delivery Time Concerns
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bernard,

I understand you are working hard to meet our needs, but I need to address the delivery timelines for our fuel shipments. Our company's fuel imports are crucial, particularly given both the winter weather and current heat wave conditions. Unfortunately, the ongoing delays are negatively impacting our business.

Could you please explore potential solutions to mitigate these delays? As your company operates in a similar sector, I trust you understand the urgency of this matter.

Thank you for your attention to this,
Anna Kovalenko

email_chain.body:
Dear Emma,

Kind regards,

email_chain.body:
Dear Ian,

My name is Jane, and I am responding to your inquiry regarding the sale of 10,000 MT of graphite electrodes to Durban. We are looking for a purchase price around USD 27.10 per metric ton. Would you be available to discuss this further?

Regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Graphite Electrode Inquiry - China to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for your interest. I am not a buyer. I am looking to sell 10,000 MT of graphite electrodes to Durban. I already have a quote at USD 30.63 per metric ton. You are welcome to contact me if you have a buyer at that price.

Kind regards,
Ian

email_chain.subject: Re: Graphite Electrode Inquiry - China to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Ian,

My apologies for the misunderstanding. I am looking for a supplier for 10,000 MT. Is that a possibility?

Regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Graphite Electrode Inquiry - China to Durban
email_chain.body:

My name is Peter, and we've been in contact before. I'm not sure if you remember, but I have graphite available from Vietnam. Do you still have a need for graphite? My price is USD 20.00 per metric ton. Please let me know if you are interested in placing an order.

email_chain.subject: LTL Rotterdam to FTL London - Warehouse Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Mr. Sangwoo,

We're looking to discharge an LTL container at Rotterdam on the 27th and transit it to London with an FTL 20-footer. Could you quote us for a warehouse in London to receive the container on the 30th?

Regards,
Mikhail

email_chain.subject: Re: LTL Rotterdam to FTL London - Warehouse Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

I can handle this request, but I'm a bit concerned about the tight timeline, especially if there's any discrepancy in our internal scheduling. We might struggle if it's left until the last minute.

Regards,
Miki

email_chain.subject: Regarding the Rotterdam Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi,

I tried to get a quote for this, but my colleagues are saying it's too expensive. I'm a bit disappointed.

Regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding the Rotterdam Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Julia,

I've sent an email to your other address with a potential solution that should work.

Since they didn't respond to you, they probably think it's not worth their time to respond to a junior employee. I am disappointed in them as well.

To be able to respond to urgent situations, it often helps to be in a management position. Unfortunately, that's sometimes how things work. However, you might be able to convince them that it’s actually beneficial to work with someone who is younger and more flexible than a manager. This is a great opportunity for you, and I'm sorry you don't have the immediate authority.

email_chain.subject: Re: LTL Rotterdam to FTL London - Warehouse Quote Request
email_chain.body:
Hello Mikhail,

We can do that if you make a booking immediately. Please place an order, and I will let you know the price and date.

Miki

email_chain.subject: Analysis of Rotterdam Shipment Handling
email_chain.body:
Regarding the handling of Mikhail's request:

Mikhail wasn't satisfied with Miki's reply because he wanted a lower price. Miki likely chose this approach because Mikhail wasn't a manager.

I believe that higher management should prioritize responses to individuals in decision-making positions within client companies.

email_chain.subject: Impact of Vessel Stranding on Australian Supply
email_chain.body:

A vessel was stranded off the coast of Australia due to mechanical failure. This has caused a significant reduction in transport capacity to that area, leading to a potential supply shortage. I've attached a file with some market information that might be helpful as you prepare your presentation.

I hope this helps, and that your operations aren't too affected.

Best wishes,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Presentation Review Request

I was wondering if you'd be able to take a look at my presentation. I have a few questions I'd like clarified. Would you be free sometime this afternoon or tomorrow?

Andrew

email_chain.body:

email_chain.body:
Hi Sergei,

I hope you're well.

I'm in the final stages of preparing my final report on the quality of agricultural products. I've included a section on food processing as it pertains to these products. As you know, my PhD is in food processing, and I thought it would be beneficial to include this perspective.

I was hoping you could review this section with me. I'm a little unsure about how the key concepts link together and how best to apply them in an industry context. Your input and guidance would be greatly appreciated.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Andrew

email_chain.subject: Urgent capacity enq - Dubai to Mauritius
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Kuo,

I am contacting you on behalf of a bulk owner and require space for 1800 MT (1.8MMT) of LDPE pellets from Dubai to Mauritius. Our next laycan is March 23rd, and we need to know ASAP if your containership is available for this voyage.

I am currently in India and unable to finalize the rate and booking directly. Would it be possible to proceed via email?

Kind regards,
Max

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent capacity enq - Dubai to Mauritius
email_chain.body:
Dear Max,

I am answering on behalf of Ms. Kuo, our CEO.

Thank you for your inquiry. Unfortunately, we are unable to offer cargo space for the entire quantity of 1800 MT on our container ship, SINGAPORE EXPRESS, for a direct Dubai-Mauritius route.

However, at my insistence, I'm exploring an alternative option involving transshipment via Singapore. We are currently working on a full quote for space from Singapore to Mauritius (two legs). I hope to have confirmation later this week and will let you know the rates as soon as they are available.

In the meantime, to facilitate the process, I suggest we start with a fixed rate offer. Please send me a proposal, and we can then adjust the rates based on the actual loaded quantity.

Kind regards,
Berdous Weitz

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent capacity enq - Dubai to Mauritius
email_chain.body:
Dear Sir,

The company will not be able to proceed with the offer for 1800 MT LDPE pellets with transshipment. 

Kind regards

email_chain.subject: RE: Urgent capacity enq - Dubai to Mauritius
email_chain.body:

Kind regards

Freight Inquiry: 85,000 MT Steel Scrap - Tianjin to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Rahman,

We have a full cargo of 85,000 MT steel scrap loaded at Tianjin, destined for Karachi. Given the current market conditions, could you offer us a competitive lump sum freight rate?

Regards,
Hussein

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Inquiry: 85,000 MT Steel Scrap - Tianjin to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Good day Hussein,

Thank you for your inquiry. Unfortunately, we are unable to meet your initial target. Margins are currently tight due to high demand, and the best we can offer is a slim margin of $1.00/MT over current market levels.

Our new offer is USD 46/MT, lump sum $3,910,000. Other offers we've received are in a similar range.

I'm happy to provide trade references if needed.

Regards,
Rahman

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Inquiry: 85,000 MT Steel Scrap - Tianjin to Karachi
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Rahman,

Thank you for your prompt reply. I appreciate your transparency regarding the market conditions. 

We will accept your offer of USD 46/MT (lumpsum USD 3,910,000). Please send over your banking details and I will forward our trade reference to your team.

If you could expedite the booking process, it would be highly appreciated.

Best regards,
Hussein

email_chain.subject: Happy 2025! Introducing Wooden LEGO!
email_chain.body:
Hello Eric,

Happy New Year! We're excited to announce the launch of our new range of wooden LEGO bricks, available worldwide. We believe these will be a fantastic addition to our product line and a wonderful option for children.

As a special introductory offer, we're providing a 20% discount on purchases exceeding 1 million LEGO units. This promotion is valid until January 3rd, so act fast!

Best wishes,

Alice Smith

email_chain.subject: Wooden LEGO Safety Testing & Production
email_chain.body:
Dear Eric,

Following up on our wooden LEGO launch, I wanted to share some information about our safety and production processes. We've partnered with a leading manufacturer in China to source and process the raw wood. Ensuring the safety of our products is paramount.

Recognizing potential concerns about splinters or sharp edges compared to plastic LEGOs, we implemented rigorous quality control measures. We sent 500 wooden LEGO bricks to a certified independent laboratory for thorough testing.

The results confirmed that our wooden LEGOs meet the same high safety standards as our plastic versions. They are safe, non-toxic, non-irritating, and durable. We are confident in the quality and safety of our wooden LEGO product line.

Best regards,

Alice Smith

email_chain.subject: Expanding Wooden LEGO Distribution - European Market
email_chain.body:
Dear Eric,

We are pleased to see strong initial demand for our wooden LEGOs, particularly in Europe. We've received numerous requests from countries including Germany, France, Austria, and the Netherlands.

To effectively expand distribution and meet this growing demand, we plan to partner with regional agents who have established networks and expertise in the toy market. These agents will play a crucial role in introducing and promoting our wooden LEGOs in their respective territories.

We are offering a 20% commission to agents who successfully secure distribution contracts. We believe this is a mutually beneficial opportunity for significant growth.

Thank you for your continued interest.

Sincerely,

Alice Smith

email_chain.subject: Urgent Shipping Quote Request - Spare Parts - Los Angeles to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
I am urgently shipping several spare parts from Los Angeles to Hamburg. The total weight is approximately 2800 kg, and the largest dimension is 27 mm oversized. Earliest arrival desired is next week. Could you provide your best estimate as soon as possible?

Sincerely,
Calvin Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipping Quote Request - Spare Parts - Los Angeles to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Calvin,

Thank you for your inquiry. We would be glad to provide you with a quote and transportation options for your shipment.

To accurately assess your needs, we require the following information:

- Number of packages
- Weight per package
- Dimensions of each package (Length x Width x Height)
- Exact origin address in Los Angeles
- Destination port in Hamburg

This information will allow us to determine the most suitable transport method.

I am currently traveling to California and my direct contact information is limited. I will be able to call you within two days.

Sincerely,
Shipping Company Sales Team
sales@shippingcompany.com

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Shipping Quote Request - Spare Parts - Los Angeles to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for sending the requested information. We are reviewing the package details and will get back to you as soon as possible with a shipping offer.

Sincerely,
Shipping Company Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Shipping Quote - Spare Parts - Los Angeles to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Customer,

We have received and discussed the package details with our marketing department. We can offer you two options:

- By air freight (via DHL Air Courier)
- By sea freight

Both options have pros and cons. Please find the detailed information below:

DHL Air Courier

- Good for time-sensitive packages: air freight is the fastest way to go for urgent deliveries.
- Requires an agent to pick up packages. Some of our agents have storage facilities available.
- Exact arrival time is not guaranteed; delays can occur, potentially up to 24 hours. Also, the driver may not always be able to remain at the pickup address for the entire scheduled time. Please confirm pickup details with the agent.
- Generally more expensive than sea freight.

Sea Freight:

[Details about sea freight would go here in a real email.  This is omitted because there are no details in the source text.]

Sincerely,
Shipping Company Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Follow up: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body:
Good afternoon Mr. Ross,

Do you recall the delivery incident involving the Ethanol shipment from Vigo to Fos sur Mer? To prevent similar occurrences in the future, it would be beneficial to review the load list and schedule.

Best regards,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow up: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body:
Yes, I remember it very well. I'd like to understand specifically what went wrong and the key lessons we can learn from it.

Most importantly, how do we ensure a similar incident doesn't happen again? We need to avoid repeating that error, especially given the potential environmental hazards.

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow up: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body:
My team will examine the incident thoroughly and provide you with a detailed report. Our aim is to minimize the possibility of similar situations arising in the future, and our ultimate goal is accident-free operations with minimal risks.

Our organization must maintain a strong commitment to environmental safety, as we all share the responsibility of protecting our planet.

Best,
Rory

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow up: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body: I agree, Rory, but we can't rely solely on individual diligence. Our systems are equally important. We need robust systems in place to guide and ensure employees follow the correct procedures. Our overarching goal must be to ensure safety and prevent errors in future operations.

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow up: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body: During my initial review, I've come across a number of errors in the existing process, and several instances of similar mistakes occurring in the past. We need to implement a reliable mechanism to proactively prevent such errors.

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow up: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body: That's very true. We need a robust mechanism to prevent these errors. Our goal must be to strive for error-free operations. However, our systems shouldn't only be about fault-finding – we need to create a culture of proactive prevention.

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow up: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body: I remember that the incident reports were only discovered a couple of weeks after the event. My question is: what caused that delay in detection?

email_chain.subject: Re: Follow up: Ethanol Delivery Incident - Vigo to Fos sur Mer
email_chain.body: The reason for the delay in detecting such errors is, unfortunately, similar to what happens in many organizations. It's often due to the routine nature of the job, which can lead to complacency and oversight.

Would you be available for a quick call? It would be much faster than exchanging emails. You can reach me at my office number, 2033xxxxxxxx. My office hours are 08:00-17:00. Are you free anytime during those hours?

Yours,
Jonas

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Transport Options & Ship Delay
email_chain.body:
Thanks Jonas,

I'm just heading into a meeting and won't be able to get away. I'll call you back next Tuesday or Wednesday when I'm back in the office.

If you don't hear from me by the end of Wednesday, it unfortunately means I haven't been able to find a solution. Otherwise, we'll connect then for a call.

My office hours are 8:30 am to 4:30 pm. I will let you know next week when I'm available to call.

Bye!

email_chain.subject: Ethanol Shipment - Aqaba to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hello Ms. Chao,

Thank you for the quotation. We'd like to request an extra day of laytime at the load port as load restrictions will likely prevent immediate sailing. Could you please provide your best rate for shipping 10,500 MT of ethanol ready for shipment from Aqaba to Busan, with a sailing window in approximately 4 days?

Thank you,

Jan

email_chain.subject: Re: Ethanol Shipment - Aqaba to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hello Jan,

We are planning to schedule a VLCC bulker to sail before the middle of next week. While guaranteeing an extra day of laytime isn't possible at this moment, we might be able to accommodate it on short notice. We'll inform you immediately if a day becomes available. However, you may find a more competitive rate without the extra day.

Also, we appreciate your continued cooperation with adhering to loading procedures for VLCC cargoes. We've observed several vessels arriving from Busan with insufficient ballast. We had to reduce ballast on our last vessel to ensure sufficient load margins for the remaining cargo. This is our reason for requesting the minimum ballast for our chemical vessel.

Furthermore, please be advised that if you have any cargo nearing its expiry date and needing storage,

email_chain.subject: Re: Ethanol Shipment - Aqaba to Busan
email_chain.body:
Hello Felix,

Thank you for the information. The tanks are currently holding 80% capacity of a prior gas cargo and will continue to do so until the next loading. Can you provide a current rate for the ethanol shipment under these conditions?

Best regards,

Jan

email_chain.subject: Re: Ethanol Shipment - Aqaba to Busan
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Jan,

I can provide a more precise rate once I have the full cargo characteristics. However, you might achieve a lower overall cost if we handle the bunker fuel for the voyage. We can transport your ethanol to Busan on a confirmed VLCC Bulker (per your request) and then arrange the bunker fuel from Busan back to Aqaba. You would then either pay for the bunker or arrange it independently. This would involve a discount on the bunker oil price at Busan.

If you wish, I can initiate the bunker and sailing arrangements, potentially freeing up approximately 5,500 MT of available space.

email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rey,

Thank you for your inquiry. Please see below for our initial response regarding the supply of 2,000MT of sugar oil:

*   We can offer 3,000 tons/month from August to December 2021.
*   We can offer 4,000 tons/month from January to June 2022.
*   Availability for delivery in July and December 2022 will depend on supplier(s).

We have allocated 100MT for a trial shipment. The invoice will be sent within 7 working days of the shipment date.

FOB Uruguay is also available upon request.

Regards,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sugar Oil - 2000MT to Norway
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Rey,

Further to our previous email, please find a more detailed breakdown of our availability for sugar oil:

For a prompt response, we can offer a split supply (sugar and oil) over two months, with options for subsequent months:

*   July to September 2022: 4,000MT per month, FOB Uruguay
*   October 2022 through December 2022: 2,000MT per month, FOB Uruguay
*   January 2023 through March 2023: 3,000MT per month, FOB Uruguay
*   April 2023 through June 2023: 3,000MT per month, FOB Uruguay

In July and December 2022, we can offer 100MT per month.

Shipping will take under 35 days from the date of order, FOB Uruguay.
As mentioned, the first trial shipment has...

Regards,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sugar Oil - 2000MT to Norway
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rey,

Further to our previous correspondence regarding the supply of 2,000MT of sugar oil, we propose the following:

We can supply 4,000MT per month (1,000MT of sugar and 3,000MT of oil) for the five months from July 2022 to November 2022.

The sugar is available from July to December 2022, and the oil will be available from January to June 2023.

However, we would like to highlight a slight cost difference between the periods:

*   July to September: USD 2.25 per liter
*   October to December: USD 2.30 per liter

Also, for sugar orders, the price is USD 4.00 per...

Regards,
Joe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Sugar Oil - 2000MT to Norway
email_chain.body:
Dear Joe,

Thank you for reaching out to us regarding sugar oil.

As mentioned in our email, we are primarily interested in securing 2,000MT per month for the period of July to September 2022.

However, we are also open to exploring the possibility of increasing our supply to 4,000MT per month for the subsequent 5 months, from October 2022 to February 2023.

Additionally, if we can commit to a minimum order of 100MT per month beyond that period, we would be happy to discuss the terms and conditions.

We look forward to your reply.

With best regards,
Mr. Rey
Managing Director

email_chain.subject: Regarding Car Transportation to Copenhagen
email_chain.body:
I have just received confirmation regarding the car transportation to Copenhagen. It appears we are unable to transport the car from Rotterdam as initially planned. The lead time is too short, and the shipper requires transport next week. Could you advise if you have a suitable alternative carrier in mind? 

With best regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Car Transportation to Copenhagen
email_chain.body:
I would be most grateful if you could let me know of any options for transporting this vehicle from Rotterdam to Copenhagen. I was surprised to hear that transporting it next week would not be possible.

Regards,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Car Transportation to Copenhagen
email_chain.body:
Bill,

I'm very sorry, but I'm currently unable to assist. I've just learned that the van carrying the car has already departed from Rotterdam. I've contacted our contacts in Rotterdam to check if there's any chance to redirect the car to Copenhagen. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Car Transportation to Copenhagen - Update
email_chain.body:
I'm afraid I can't offer an immediate solution this time, Bill. We currently have the car at our facility in Rotterdam. We can offer you some storage options and also handle the export of the car to Denmark. This export process would take approximately a week. Would you be interested in this alternative?

Regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Car Transportation to Copenhagen - Good News!
email_chain.body:
I would like to inform you that we have picked up the car from Rotterdam and it is now en route to Denmark. It is scheduled to arrive at the port of Copenhagen at approximately 11:00 next Tuesday morning. I hope this compensates for the inconvenience caused by not transporting the car on the original date.

Regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Car Transportation to Copenhagen - Delivery Confirmation
email_chain.body:
I am very pleased to inform you that your car arrived on Tuesday morning at 11:00 as scheduled. The driver has delivered your car to your home and is awaiting your arrival. I have also sent a notification via text message to ensure you were aware of the delivery.

Regards,
Anders

email_chain.subject: Polymer Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:

My deadline is tight, but I believe I can manage a 2-3 day turnaround for this shipment of polymer. We have a crew with five MT per person, which they can load via crane. email_chain.subject: Re: Polymer Shipment Inquiry
email_chain.body:

To facilitate internal discussions, could you please provide a detailed cost analysis of the delivered cost, broken down as much as possible (e.g. raw material, production, port charges, insurance etc.)? I will be in touch soon.

Regards,

email_chain.subject: Cargo Inquiry: Acid Anhydride - New Orleans to Saudi Arabia
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Kamhi,

We are currently working on securing transport for a 6,000 MT cargo of acid anhydride from New Orleans to Saudi Arabia. Could you please provide a standard freight rate quote, assuming we finalize the booking on Tuesday?

Thanks,
Bobby

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry: Acid Anhydride - New Orleans to Saudi Arabia
email_chain.body:
Hi Bobby,

Thanks for your inquiry.

Our standard rate would be $25 per MT, FOB New Orleans. We can also offer containerized shipment in 40' Flat Rack containers, at a rate of approximately $1400 per container.

Regarding transit time, ocean freight typically takes around 16 weeks, so you should expect arrival approximately 16 weeks from booking confirmation, assuming standard payment terms.

As a point of information, the current spot rate is approximately 28% higher than our quoted standard rate. While the seller may be hoping to capitalize on this, they may not secure a spot booking or the buyer may be unable to pay the higher rate. This is why I'm suggesting you confirm your requirements with me on Tuesday so we can discuss a fixed price.

Please call me on Tuesday to discuss your requirements.

Let me know if you need any further information.

Best regards,
Ron

email_chain.subject: Re: Cargo Inquiry: Acid Anhydride - New Orleans to Saudi Arabia
email_chain.body:
Hi Ron,

Thanks for your email. I will forward this information to the client.

Hope to hear from you later.

Regards,
Bobby

email_chain.body:

1.  Product: Polypropylene Powder
2.  Test Method: ICP-OES
3.  Temperature Range: 50°C - 100°C
4.  Vacuum: A vacuum of < 10^-4 Torr is required during analysis.
5.  Heating: Please provide the time and temperature details for the calcination process.

If the above specifications are possible, we would be willing to proceed with the order. Kindly advise your team on this.

Kind regards,

Eva

email_chain.subject: Urea Shipment: Dubai to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Good morning Patrick,

We are planning to ship 12,500 MT of urea from Dubai to Jakarta next month. Could you please advise whether we'll need to charter a full vessel for this quantity?

Best regards,
Penny

email_chain.subject: Re: Urea Shipment: Dubai to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Hello Penny,

Whether a full vessel is required depends on several factors. The type of vessel available and the urea's density are key considerations.

When shipping 12,500 MT in a single shipment, we need to assess:

1) The maximum weight capacity of the available vessels.
2) The density of the urea itself, which will affect the volume occupied.
3) The stowage factor, indicating how efficiently the urea can be packed into the vessel's holds.

Essentially, we need to determine the urea's volumetric requirements to ascertain if a full vessel charter is necessary. Providing the urea's density will allow a more accurate assessment.

email_chain.subject: Re: Urea Shipment: Dubai to Jakarta
email_chain.body:
Penny,

My previous message contained some generic shipping points. It seems I was partially responding to another inquiry, my apologies. To clarify, my previous points stand, and different vessel types used to transport LPG aren't relevant to this conversation.

The key to determining if you need a full vessel for your shipment of urea is to determine the density of the urea, and use that information to estimate the volume required.

email_chain.subject: Pallet Shipping Cost: China to North America
email_chain.body:
Good morning Patrick,

I'm looking into shipping pallets from China to North America. Before placing the order, I need an estimate of the shipping cost per pallet. Could you provide some information?

Thank you,
Mika

email_chain.subject: Re: Pallet Shipping Cost: China to North America
email_chain.body:
Thanks Mika for your message.

Shipping pallets from China to North America varies based on the specific origin and destination points. The typical route involves a maritime vessel traversing the Panama Canal and subsequent loading onto a container ship.

As a starting point, here's an approximate cost for shipping a 4 m² pallet from China to Los Angeles: US$200 per pallet (approximately US$80 per cubic meter).

Please provide the specific origin and destination, as well as the dimensions and weight of the pallets, and I can give you a more precise quote.

If you have any further questions, feel free to ask.

Thanks!

email_chain.subject: Following up on inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hey Mr. Smith,

Just wanted to confirm that you've received my initial inquiry. Would you mind letting me know if you're able to help us out this week?

Also, would you mind giving me a few minutes to chat on the phone? I have some specific information to share with you.

Thanks,
Beth

email_chain.subject: Re: Following up on inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Beth,

Thank you for your email and interest. We've reviewed your initial application and require some additional details to process your request. Please provide the following:

1.  Your PAYE reference.
2.  An assessment of your position.
3.  A signed employment contract.
4.  A signed Confidentiality and Non-Competition Agreement.

If you can provide this information, we can assist you immediately.

Regards,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Following up on inquiry - Missing Documents
email_chain.body:
Good morning Beth,

Thank you for submitting the initial application form. We've reviewed the information provided but are still missing some key documents. Before we can proceed, please submit the following:

1.  A signed employment contract.
2.  A signed Confidentiality and Non-Competition Agreement.

If you have these documents available, please send them over at your earliest convenience.

Regards,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.subject: Following up on our conversation - Required Documents
email_chain.body:
Good morning Beth,

I wanted to follow up on our conversation from last week. We've reviewed the information you provided, and we still need a few items in order to process your request. Please provide:

1. A signed employment contract.
2. A signed Confidentiality and Non-Competition Agreement.

If you have the necessary information, we can proceed with your request.

As a reminder, it's helpful for us to understand:

*   Is there anything else you'd like to ask me about?
*   Are you currently aware of any additional information that you can provide that will assist our client with their request?
*   Can you provide any more details about the situation you're seeking assistance for?

To help us, please also consider:

*   How much detail is enough?
*   How will the prospect identify the issue?
*   How will you know when you have the correct information?

Regards,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.subject: Reminder: Required Documents - Employment Details
email_chain.body:
Good morning Beth,

Thank you again for submitting your application form. We've reviewed the information and are still awaiting the following documents to proceed:

1. A signed employment contract.
2. A signed Confidentiality and Non-Competition Agreement.

Could you please provide these at your earliest convenience?

Specifically:

1.  Can you please provide a copy of the employment contract or a signed copy if you have it?
2.  Have you previously completed a signed Confidentiality and Non-Competition Agreement, or is there a copy available?

To ensure we meet your needs, please clarify:

*   What does the customer want you to do?
*   How do they want you to do it?
*   When do they want you to do it?

Regards,
Mr. Smith

email_chain.subject: Vessel Inquiry: 8,000 MT Solvents - US Gulf to Petronella

Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry: 8,000 MT Solvents - US Gulf to Petronella
email_chain.body:
Dear Adrian,

Please forward your Purchase Order to our Logistics Manager, David at david.miller@shipco.com. He will get back to you within 24 hours regarding vessel availability.

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry: 8,000 MT Solvents - US Gulf to Petronella - Urgent
email_chain.body:
Dear Adrian,

Thank you for your proposal. While the terms are favorable, this shipment is extremely urgent. As no other vessels are immediately available, I have booked space on the DNV Sparrow.

We anticipate incurring $3,000 USD in demurrage, which we understand will be added to your invoice.

Please provide the FFO (Free Flow Opening), Draft, and Deadweight Tonnage (DWT) for the DNV Sparrow at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,

Denis

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry: 8,000 MT Solvents - US Gulf to Petronella - Urgent - DNV Sparrow Details
email_chain.body:
Dear Denis,

Thanks for your response. We understand the DNV Sparrow is currently en route from the Gulf to Petronella, with an estimated arrival in two days.

The information we have on file is as follows:

*   FFO: 24,192 cubic feet
*   Draft: 16.5 feet
*   Deadweight: 2,000 MT

Let me know if you require any further details.

Kind regards,

Adrian

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Inquiry: 8,000 MT Solvents - US Gulf to Petronella - Urgent - DNV Sparrow Details

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: 10,000 MT Gasoline Houston to Canary Islands
email_chain.body:

We need a vessel for 10,000 MT of gasoline from Houston to the Canary Islands. Could you please provide your lumpsum freight idea? Also, do you have any preferred laycan dates and demurrage conditions?

Thank you,

Amber Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 10,000 MT Gasoline Houston to Canary Islands
email_chain.body:
Dear Amber,

Thank you for your inquiry. I believe there has been some confusion, as Car Traders specializes in automobile transport, not bulk liquid cargo. The information you received appears to be related to a car shipment.

Per car specifications:
Length: 4.7 m
Weight: 2,500 kg
Fuel consumption: 2 l/100 km
Horsepower: 100 kW
Capacity: Up to 9 passengers
Dimensions: 3.6 m x 1.6 m x 1.9 m

Our Sample Car Transport Offer:
Fuel consumption: 3 l/100 km
LCOE: $15.36

This includes transport of the complete car from port to port, plus limited insurance for theft or damages at the port. If your client wishes to add passengers or cargo *within the car*, please contact us again. We can tailor this offer to that specific situation.

I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Please let me know if you have any other questions regarding vehicle transport.

Best regards,
Sales Team
Car Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 10,000 MT Gasoline Houston to Canary Islands
email_chain.body:
Dear Car Traders,

Thank you for your prompt reply and clarification. I apologize for the incorrect inquiry; it seems my email was misdirected. I will ensure future communications are properly routed.

Best regards,

Amber Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 10,000 MT Gasoline Houston to Canary Islands
email_chain.body:
Dear Amber,

No problem at all! We understand that mistakes happen. We're happy to hear you'll be more careful going forward. We'll contact you as soon as we have the customer’s confirmation of their auto transport needs if they're interested in our car transportation offer.

Regards,
Car Traders

email_chain.subject: Freight Indication: Bulk Corn Starch - Bangkok to Haiphong

Based on current market rates, our standard bulk shipping rates for corn starch from Bangkok to Haiphong are estimated to be $115 USD/mt, including inland delivery in Thailand and Vietnam. This is based on a tonnage of 440 MT per unit.

If you have any other questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.

Best regards,
Jane Doe

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote: Bulk Corn Starch - Bangkok to Haiphong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. David,

Thank you for your inquiry regarding the purchase of bulk corn starch from Thailand. We would like to provide you with a freight quote for your shipment from the Port of Bangkok to Haiphong.

Our base rate for this shipment is $115 USD/mt, including inland delivery in Thailand and Vietnam. Please note that this rate is based on the current market conditions and can be adjusted based on the specific requirements of your shipment.

The following is a detailed cost breakdown for your reference (per MT):

*   Inland delivery from our terminal in Bangkok: $550 USD 
*   Port-to-port shipping charges: $77 USD
*   Customs clearance and handling fees: $8 USD

Therefore the Total freight rate is $115 USD/mt. 

If you have any questions or require further assistance, please let me know.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Bulk Corn Starch - Bangkok to Haiphong - Important Update
email_chain.body:
Hello David,

Please accept our apologies for the delay in responding to your inquiry regarding the shipment of bulk corn starch from Bangkok to Haiphong. We appreciate your patience as we worked to address your concerns and provide you with a reliable and accurate freight quote.

Based on the current market rates, our standard bulk shipping rates for corn starch from Bangkok to Haiphong were estimated to be $115 USD/mt, including inland delivery in Thailand and Vietnam. However, due to the significant rise in the cost of fuel and other related expenses, we have revised our freight rate for this shipment to $125 USD/mt, effective immediately. This adjustment is to ensure that we can provide our clients with a reliable and cost-effective solution for their transportation needs.

We understand that this increase may be a concern, but we believe that it is necessary.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Bulk Corn Starch - Bangkok to Haiphong - Updated Rate
email_chain.body:
Hi David,

We have received your request for a freight quote for the shipment of bulk corn starch from Bangkok to Haiphong. Our initial estimate was $115 USD/mt, including inland delivery in Thailand and Vietnam. However, due to the current market volatility and the rising cost of transportation, we have revised our freight rate for this shipment to $125 USD/mt, effective immediately. This adjustment is to ensure that we can provide our clients with a reliable and cost-effective solution for their transportation needs.

If you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Jane Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Bulk Corn Starch - Bangkok to Haiphong - Updated Rate
email_chain.body:

We understand the updated rate is $125 USD/mt, including inland delivery in Thailand and Vietnam.

Kind regards,
David

email_chain.subject: Coal Import Inquiry - Newport News
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Doyle,

Hope you're doing well.

Our client needs to import 3,800 MT of coal from London to Newport News. Could you please provide an estimate at your earliest convenience?

Separately, we've just signed for 3,000 MT of salt from Le Havre to Galveston. Our agent suggested combining the salt cargo with the coal to potentially reduce shipping costs. What are your thoughts on this?

Best regards,
Donald

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Import Inquiry - Newport News
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

Yes, my son just dispatched a vessel to load his own 3,000 MT cargo in Le Havre. He anticipates it will be shipped by the 1st of next month. The coal shipment would be similar in size, but potentially a bit more expensive. Have you heard anything further from your client?

How is your daughter doing?

Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Import Inquiry - Newport News
email_chain.body:
Hi Gloria,

Thanks for your reply from Friday. We had a follow-up conference with another party on Saturday morning and they've agreed to a cheaper rate. However, my boss has put a hold on any more coal shipments for next month, so please disregard the request. Please do not tell him you gave a new price quote.

On a different note, I wanted to mention I received a new promotion. My daughter is still single, but I think she might appreciate a nice bracelet.

Have a nice week,
Donald

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Import Inquiry - Newport News
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

That's quite alright. I would only meet my quota if I charged you the new, lower rate for the coal, so no worries. 

Your daughter will absolutely love this bracelet; let me know if she needs another one. I recently saw a birthday present in a catalog and thought of her.

How is school going?

Regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Saturday Plans
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

Your daughter and I spoke last night, and she's very excited about going to the mall this Saturday. We don't have any set plans yet, so it's the perfect weekend for it.

By the way, do you happen to know the new manager at the local car rental agency?

Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Weekend Update
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

I've already let my daughter know that I'm busy this weekend. 

Your new car is fantastic! The extra time you spent at home last week clearly made a difference. I'd suggest you prioritize that more often.

Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Dinner Last Night
email_chain.body:
Hi Donald,

You and your daughter were absolutely charming last night. She's such a wonderful person but hasn't had a boyfriend in years.

Are you and your wife still planning on coming to the concert?

Best regards,
Gloria

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Market Price for CFCL Grades 54, 55, and 56
email_chain.body:
Good day,

Could you kindly confirm the latest market price for CFCL grades 54, 55, and 56?

Thank you for your attention,

Liana Tanoov

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Market Price for CFCL Grades 54, 55, and 56
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Tanoov,

The latest market price for CFCL 54, 55, and 56 was last updated on November 26th and was $40.49/unit.

Kindly be informed that we have stopped importing CFCL grade materials, and this material is now available only on request. Please note that the price may have changed since the last update.

Please reach me at your convenience for any further assistance.

Thank you for your understanding.

Antal Khilko

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Market Price for CFCL Grades 54, 55, and 56
email_chain.body:
Good day Mr. Khilko,

I am disappointed that CFCL is not readily available. I was counting on purchasing this material for my project and, currently, do not have any other viable options. I may be able to find an alternative, but the ones available are proving to be more expensive.

If you have any recommendations regarding alternative materials, or possible sources where CFCL might be available (even if limited supply), please share the information with me.

Thank you for your attention.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Market Price for CFCL Grades 54, 55, and 56
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Tanoov,

Thank you for your message and please accept my apologies for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, price fluctuations are not the only reason we decided to significantly reduce our import of this material. 

With the growing production of carbon fiber products globally, the reliable supply of CFCL has become more volatile. It has become increasingly difficult to secure consistent stock.

Moreover, there are limited warehouses in the USA that are licensed to store this specific product safely. Therefore, to ensure the quality of this material and avoid any damage during transportation and storage, we have adjusted our approach to CFCL.

We understand that the prices of other composite materials are increasing. It is important to note that you are always welcome to reach out to us with your specific requirements, and we will be more than happy to help you explore alternatives for your project.

email_chain.subject: CFCL 54/55/56 - Price and Specifications Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Tanoov,

I will start my project this Monday and would like to place an order for CFCL immediately. Could you please provide an updated price list, as well as the specifications for CFCL 54, 55, and 56?

I also have a question: Where can I find technical data sheets for these materials? I understand that CFCL 55 and 56 are available in two variants, with different thicknesses. Is this correct?

Thank you for your attention.

Lucie Lopez

email_chain.subject: Re: CFCL 54/55/56 - Price and Specifications Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Good day Ms. Lopez,

Thank you for reaching out to us.

Regarding pricing, it remains as stated on our website: https://www.canamyte.com/pages/carbon-fiber-composite-materials.
We regularly update prices for our customers directly on the website; you should find the most current figures there.

email_chain.subject: Re: CFCL 54/55/56 - Price and Specifications Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Tanoov,

Thank you very much for the quick response and updating the prices on the website.

To confirm, CFCL 54/55 is available in 5mm, 7mm, and 10mm thicknesses, while CFCL 56 is available in 10mm and 12mm thicknesses. Is this correct?

Could you please provide me with technical data sheets for these materials? I understand that you are manufacturing the composites, but I would like to have the data sheets readily available in case your production stops, and I need to switch to another manufacturer.

Please find attached images of the product and the technical data sheet for CFCL 55 and 56, if available.

Thank you for your attention.

Lucie Lopez

email_chain.subject: Re: CFCL 54/55/56 - Price and Specifications Inquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Ms. Lopez,

Thank you for your message.

The thickness options for CFCL 55/56 are correct.

Technical Data Sheets for CFCL 54 are...

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Potential Shipment - Maputo and LON to NEW
email_chain.body:
Hi Mr. Robertson,

We are loading a 6,600MT cargo for Maputo next week. Separately, do you have a vessel available to move 15,000MT cargo from London (LON) to New York (NEW) in the coming weeks?

Regards,
Gert

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Potential Shipment - Maputo and LON to NEW
email_chain.body:
Hi Gert,

Regarding the London to New York shipment, we currently have a vessel with 6,000MT capacity available in London. The ship's total capacity is 16,000MT.

If you're flexible and still require this shipment in approximately 2-3 weeks, we have an opening. What is your preferred loading date?

Regards,
Wade

email_chain.subject: RE: Inquiry: Potential Shipment - Maputo and LON to NEW
email_chain.body:
Hi Wade,

30 June would likely be the best date for us. I'll confirm internally and get back to you on 29 June.

Regards,
Gert

email_chain.subject: Following Up: London to New York Shipment (6,000MT)
email_chain.body:
Hi Gert,

Just following up on your request for the 6,000MT move from London to New York.

To reiterate options from the last message: We also have a ship opening on 7 July for 6,000MT move from LON to NEW.

Regarding your initial inquiry for a 15,000MT load, unfortunately, the vessel we currently have available does not have sufficient space for that quantity.

Please let me know if the 6,000MT move on 30 June will work for you.

Regards,
Wade

email_chain.subject: RE: Following Up: London to New York Shipment (6,000MT)
email_chain.body:
Hi Wade,

Thanks for the update. I have checked internally, and unfortunately, they cannot be flexible on the 15,000MT quantity. 

Regards,
Gert

email_chain.subject: RE: Following Up: London to New York Shipment (6,000MT)
email_chain.body:
Hi Gert,

Let me know if you are still looking for a ship to move your cargo on 30 June. If so, we have a vessel available 30 June with 6,000MT capacity.

If not, please let me know if you are looking for a ship for your cargo later this year.

Regards,
Wade

Clara
XYZ Freight Forwarding

I'd also like to highlight some additional services we offer to improve your shipping experience:

*   **Consular Documentation Assistance:** We can assist with the necessary paperwork for exporting your product.

Please let me know if you'd like to discuss these options further.

Sincerely,

Clara
XYZ Freight Forwarding
